senses.definition: 同交到心嘅朋友（#知己）飲酒，飲一千杯都覺得少；全句係「酒逢知己千杯少，話不投機半句多」。 (A thousand shots are too few when drinking with bosom friends.)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 難得我哋幾個咁啱傾，真係酒逢知己千杯少，今晚一於不醉無歸！
examples.jyutping: naan4 dak1 ngo5 dei6 gei2 go3 gam3 ngaam1 king1, zan1 hai6 zau2 fung4 zi1 gei2 cin1 bui1 siu2, gam1 maan1 jat1 jyu1 bat1 zeoi3 mou4 gwai1!
examples.translation: It's rare that we have such a great conversation. A thousand drinks with bosom friends are never enough. Let's get drunk tonight!

keywords: zau2 fung4 zi1 gei2 cin1 bui1 siu2
zau fung zi gei cin bui siu

senses.definition: （汽車）自動變速；即係識自動#轉波，配合車速同引擎嘅轉速 ((of cars) automatic transmission; auto gear shift)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢架車自動波㗎，好容易揸。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaa3 ce1 zi6 dung6 bo1 gaa3, hou2 jung4 ji6 zaa1.
examples.translation: This car runs with an automatic transmission. It's very easy to drive.

senses.definition: 引申指一個人做嘢#自動自覺 (figuratively, self-motivated)

examples.text: 呢個伙記咩都自動波唔使叫。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 fo2 gei3 me1 dou1 zi6 dung6 bo1 m4 sai2 giu3.
examples.translation: This new employee is self-motivated and doesn't need to be pushed.

senses.definition: 用藉口去攞著數或者避開責任 (to make an excuse; to take advantage of the occasion; to take the opportunity to do sth)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你咪成日借啲意唔返學先得㗎，嘥晒啲學費。
examples.jyutping: nei5 mai5 sing4 jat6 ze3 di1 ji2 m4 faan1 hok6 sin1 dak1 gaa2, saai1 saai3 di1 hok6 fai3.
examples.translation: Don't skip classes all the time using excuses. It's a waste of your tuition fees.

senses.definition: 指物件令到手腳郁動唔方便 (to be clumsy; to obstruct the hands and the legs)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你帶咁多嘢阻手阻腳，點行得快啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 daai3 gam3 do1 je5 zo2 sau2 zo2 goek3, dim2 haang4 dak1 faai3 aa3?
examples.translation: You are carrying too much stuff that make you clumsy. How can you move quickly?

senses.definition: 幫唔到手，反而為其他人帶嚟麻煩 (to be a drag on someone or something)

examples.text: 你喺廚房盞阻手阻腳㗎咋。出返去啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 hai2 cyu4 fong2 zaan2 zo2 sau2 zo2 goek3 gaa3 zaa3. ceot1 faan1 heoi3 laa1.
examples.translation: You will only be a drag in the kitchen. Just go outside.

senses.definition: 堅持原則令到人做嘢嗰陣唔方便 (to stand in someone's way)

examples.text: 公司個會計喺度阻手阻腳，我冇得亂claim的士錢喇。
examples.jyutping: gung1 si1 go3 wui6 gai3 hai2 dou6 zo2 sau2 zo2 goek3, ngo5 mou5 dak1 lyun6 kem1 dik1 si2 cin2 laa3.
examples.translation: The accountant in my company stands in the way that I can't use the loophole to claim taxi expenses anymore.

senses.definition: #侍應 (literally "to hold water pot", figuratively a "restaurant worker" or a "waiter")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿松佢喺茶樓打工做揸水煲，但係意外打爛嗮成個廚房啲碗碟。跟手就畀人抨走咗。
examples.translation: A-chung worked as a waiter at the tea house, but he accidentally broke all the plates in the kitchen and got fired.

senses.definition: 太過#俗氣，令人難以接受 (very poor taste; vulgar)

senses.definition: 有意、主動去結束自己嘅生命 (to commit suicide)

examples.jyutping: zi6 saat3 king1 hoeng3

senses.definition: #資料#來源；源於英式英文裏面同「source」同音嘅「sauce」 (data sources; literally "sauce", punning with "source" in British English)

senses.definition: 自己嘅行為或者諗法傷害返自己轉頭，為自己帶嚟困擾 (to get enmeshed in a trap of one's own devising; literally: to spin a cocoon around oneself)

examples.translation: People in troubled relationships often become trapped in trying to figure out why the relationship fell apart.

senses.definition: 華人傳統#祈福、#祭祀 嘅用品；係用紙同竹篾嚟整嘅人像或者神像，之後喺儀式中火化，代表將祈求送去超自然世界或者超渡死者（量詞：個／隻） (paper doll, a common tool for worshiping)

senses.definition: 香港其中一間大學；全名係#香港中文大學，簡稱#中大。位於#沙田#馬料水，係香港第二間大學。最初以中文作為教學語言，所以叫做中文大學，但現時已經有多科目改用英文教學。 (The Chinese University of Hong Kong)

senses.definition: 為逃避債主、執法人員、仇家等等，而離開原本身處嘅地方，去第二啲地方匿埋。「草」指#草鞋，古時遠行會著。 (to flee and hide in faraway places to escape from creditors, law enforcement, enemies, etc.)

senses.definition: 夠#醒水，能夠理解當前嘅狀況，從而作出相應嘅配合，通常威脅人先會用 (smart enough to get a picture of one's current situation)

jyutping: zi1 m4 zi1 go3 cau2 zi6 dim2 se2

senses.definition: 話人唔#知醜；#無恥 (used to call someone shameless; literally, do you know how to write the character for "shame"?)

senses.definition: 用嚟 #遊説 (used to convey a persuasive tone)

senses.definition: 好強烈噉表示#疑問 以至#質疑，有啲埋怨對方一直唔解答 (used to intensify a query or to strongly call something into question so as to almost blame the other for not answering)

examples.jyutping: gau3 ging2 dim2 gaai2 zek1? nei5 zung6 mei6 waa6 ngo5 zi1 bo3.

senses.definition: 出千、出術；原本指#番攤 莊家揸攤（抓攤）果陣出千、出術，現已較少咁用（抓攤即攞出攤子嘅動作，國語「抓」近粵音「揸」，揸攤亦有#揸fit 之意；流即係假） (to cheat; originally, it referred to the host of "fan-tan" (a gambling game) playing tricks in the process of gripping buttons; this meaning is obsolete now)
形容方法麻煩、唔直接 (describes a method that requires multiple steps or a complicated transportation route with many changes in transit)

senses.definition: （大學生常用用語）#摺 埋喺#拉把；逗留喺圖書館一段時間 (to stay in the library for a certain period of time; this term is commonly used among college students)

examples.translation: After eating, I prefer not to loiter. I will go to the library instead.

senses.definition: 原本指眼瞼快速一開一合，引申指其他物件嘅開合，或者一下光、一下暗嘅變化 (to blink; figuratively, to flicker)

senses.definition: 喺短時間內、好快就會；係比較正式嘅講法 (about to; soon; in no time)

examples.jyutping: biu2 jin2 zit3 muk6 zik1 zoeng1 hoi1 ci2.

senses.definition: 地勢高而有利觀察、防守或者施展戰術嘅地點（量詞：個） (high ground)

senses.definition: 盡力爭取成功，贏得榮譽、尊重 (to win credit or respect for; to make every effort to succeed; literally: to compete for breath)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: wai6 zi6 gei2 zaang1 hei3

senses.definition: 同其他人對同一樣嘢嘅欲望或者需求唔能夠同時滿足到，為咗優先得到佢而同其他人起衝突；#較量；#競爭；#爭奪 (to compete; to fight for)

examples.text: 幾間公司爭緊嗰份合約。
examples.jyutping: gei2 gaan1 gung1 si1 zaang1 gan2 go2 fan6 hap6 joek3.

senses.definition: 借咗人嘢，有義務要還返俾佢；或者欠人人情，有義務報答佢 (to owe somebody (money, a meal, etc.))

examples.jyutping: tiu4 jau2 zaang1 jan4 gei2 do1 cin2 aa3?
examples.translation: How much money does that person owe?

senses.definition: 缺少咗少少嘢，有埋呢樣嘢，就可以達到某個標準、做到某一樣嘢 (used to indicate that something is lacking; otherwise a certain standard would be achieved, or a task done)

examples.text: 仲爭少少就完㗎喇，捱埋佢呀！
examples.jyutping: zung6 zaang1 siu2 siu2 zau6 jyun4 gaa3 laa3, ngaai4 maai4 keoi5 aa3!
examples.translation: It's almost over! Don't give up!

senses.definition: 好似下人噉幫人斟嘢飲；服侍人 (serve someone drinks as a servant or in a servant-like fashion; literally 'pour tea and deliver water')

senses.definition: 形容某一啲#政治 立場，嘅團體、政黨、人，立場內容如：支持#改革、#社會主義、#普世主義，注意呢啲立場同對應右翼嘅內容並唔係完全對立，所以通常只係作為一個簡單區別嘅詞語 (left wing; leftist (as a political or economic stance))
一種長途巴士；喺香港嘅直通巴士通常都係直接去到中國#大陸 某地方 (coach; direct bus service)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 去好多地方直通巴都方便過高鐵。
examples.translation: For many routes, taking a direct bus is more convenient than riding the high-speed railway.

senses.definition: 表示某人血統上家譜上係嫡出嘅大仔一路數落來，有正統繼承權 (the heir; literally: eldest son and legitimate grandson)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容財產乃至地位等嘅傳統繼承觀念，以正室所生男丁最大嗰個為第一繼承人 (male-line primogeniture, the principle of inheritance by the eldest legitimate son in the family)
形成、結成 (to form)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to form a group

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
食得太飽，撐住個肚 (being too full that one cannot eat anymore, usu. have unpleasant feelings of indigestion)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: sik6 zai6
examples.translation: being surfeited

senses.definition: 好難消化嘅食物 (indigestible; hard to be digested)

examples.text: 薯仔好滯架，都係食少啲好。
examples.jyutping: syu4 zai2 hou2 zai6 gaa3, dou1 hai6 sik6 siu2 di1 hou2.
examples.translation: Potatoes are hard to digest, so we'd better have less of them.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
形容一個人驚到震，出於恐懼而對一樣嘢非常小心 (trembling with fear and trepidation; being in a blue funk)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢戰戰兢兢噉接受咗呢個重要嘅任務。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zin3 zin3 ging1 ging1 gam2 zip3 sau6 zo2 ni1 go3 zung6 jiu3 ge3 jam6 mou6.
examples.translation: She accepted the important task warily.

senses.definition: 折磨、摧殘；糟蹋、令人受傷害（通常指自己） (to torture, to cause suffering)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zok3 zin6 zi6 gei2
examples.translation: to torture oneself

senses.definition: 跟組#師姐，#ocamp 時會同#組爸 一齊帶同組新生玩嘅#師姐 (group facilitators; group mother; who will lead freshman to play in orientation camp)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 組媽話下個禮拜Re-U，你邊日得閒去？
examples.translation: group mother told me that Re-Union will be held next week. When are you free to go?

senses.definition: 參加#ocamp 嘅大學女新生 (female freshman who attend orientation camp)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 唔好諗喇，啲組女個個都有男朋友㗎。
examples.translation: don‘t think too much. All the female freshman have boyfriends.

senses.definition: 參加#ocamp 嘅大學男新生 (male freshman who attend orientation camp)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: the male freshman this year are easy to play with.

senses.definition: 跟組#師兄，#ocamp 時會同#組媽 一齊帶同組新生玩嘅#師兄 (group facilitators; group father; who will lead freshman to play in orientation camp)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我個組嘅組爸真心有料到，輕鬆贏game。
examples.translation: The group father in my group is very capable. He won the game easily.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
跟喺一個名詞或者動詞後面，指一個人喺嗰件事好出眾，通常用於反諷 (followed by a noun or verb. Refers to a person who is outstanding at specific thing. Usually used in irony)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.translation: a person with outstanding logic

senses.definition: 整一啲嘢出嚟，特別係文化、藝術嘅嘢，有時亦都會指食物 (to make; to produce (art, food, etc.))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 嚟緊有個工作坊教人製作甜品，你有冇興趣？
examples.jyutping: lai4 gan2 jau5 go3 gung1 zok3 fong1 gaau3 jan4 zai3 zok3 tim4 ban2, nei5 jau5 mou5 hing3 ceoi3?
examples.translation: There's a dessert-making workshop coming up, are you interested in it?

senses.definition: 性飢渴嘅男性面對又肥又醜嘅女性都#照殺 (males desperate for sex still find lure in fat and ugly women; literally: pork steak is also meat)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 豬扒都係肉，好過去自瀆。
examples.jyutping: zyu1 paa2 dou1 hai6 juk6, hou2 gwo3 heoi3 zi6 zuk6.
examples.translation: Banging "pork-chop" is better than jerking off.

senses.definition: #自慰，自己刺激自己嘅性器官以達至性興奮 (to masturbate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zi6 duk6 hang4 wai4
examples.translation: masturbation

senses.definition: 發生性行為 (to have sex; to make love; to bang)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 好耐冇見女朋友，好想快啲同佢執返劑。
examples.jyutping: hou2 noi6 mou5 gin3 neoi5 pang4 jau5, hou2 soeng2 faai3 di1 tung4 keoi5 zap1 faan1 zai1
examples.translation: I haven't seen my girlfriend in ages, and I really miss having sex with her.

senses.definition: 指物件阻住人行或者嘥地方；引申話人（因為堅持某啲原則）令到大家唔方便 (blocking the way or using up space wastefully; figuratively, being a stumbling block (by being too insistent, etc.))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 啲鞋盒好阻埞呀。唔要嘅就掉咗佢啦。
examples.jyutping: di1 haai4 hap2 hou2 zo2 deng6 aa3. m4 jiu3 ge3 zau6 deu6 zo2 keoi5 laa1.
examples.translation: The shoeboxes take up too much space. Throw them away if you don't need them.

senses.definition: 養豬嘅地方（量詞：個） (pigsty; pigpen)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 豬欄好臭㗎……我喺好遠都聞到陣味！
examples.jyutping: zyu1 laan1 hou2 cau3 gaa3...... ngo5 hai2 hou2 jyun5 dou1 man4 dou2 zam6 mei6!
examples.translation: Pigsties stink... I can smell it even though I am far away from them!

senses.definition: 用嚟描述青少年因為自以為是而做出奇怪嘅行為，主要特徵包括：妄想自己有超能力、妄想自己係大人物、對年幼時行為全盤否定；源自日文嘅「中二病」 ((lit. secondary 2 syndrome) Chunibyo, used to describe people who convinced themselves they have hidden knowledge or secret powers)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢條毒男中二病發作，以為自己係佐助。
examples.jyutping: nei1 tiu4 duk6 naam4 zung1 ji6 beng6 faat3 zok3, ji5 wai4 zi6 gei2 hai6 zo3 zo6
examples.translation: This guy suffers from Chunibyo. He thinks he is Sasuke Uchiha.

senses.definition: #中學 之後嘅教育程度，包括#學士、#副學士 同#高級文憑 等等嘅課程 (post-secondary education)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #書 (book)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: syu1 zik6
examples.translation: book

senses.definition: 國民身份；#國籍 (citizenship; nationality)

examples.jyutping: ngoi6 zik6
examples.translation: foreign nationality

senses.definition: 家鄉；出身嘅地方 (hometown; place of origin)

examples.jyutping: zik6 gun3
examples.translation: hometown

senses.definition: 符合一定嘅條件，經過登記之後，成為一個組織嘅成員之一 (membership)

examples.jyutping: hok6 zik6
examples.translation: studentship

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Chow", "Chau" or "Chao")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 朝代名；中國歷史上公元前1046至公元前221嘅朝代，由周武王取代#商 朝建立，最後被#秦 朝所取代 (Zhou dynasty; a dynasty in Chinese history circa 1046BC-221BC)
古代中國國名、國號用字，例如南北朝嘅北周、武則天嘅武周 (name adopted by various states in ancient China, usually transliterated as "Zhou")
形容唔長唔短距離、時間，比#長程 小，比#短程 大，實際數量跟據形容目標而定 (middle distance)
senses.label: 區別詞

senses.definition: 經濟學中一個概念，指貨物交易情況、價格完全由商人、需求推動而出現，政府只會作出最低程度行政干預，如定立法律保護人權 (free market)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 將貼文或者訊息固定喺最頂，令佢喺版面上面最優先顯示 (to pin (a post or message) to the top, making it appear first in a list)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: Help me pin this post.

senses.definition: #太陽能、#風力、地熱、#生物燃料 等等喺自然界補充速度遠遠快過人類消耗速度嘅能源 (renewable energy)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 快速標低某事 (to jot; to mark down)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to mark down

senses.definition: 唔問其他人嘅意見或感受，自己做咗先或者講咗先，擅自做決定。通常帶有貶義。 (to make one's own decision)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢又係度自作主張，搞到全世界都唔想理佢。
examples.translation: He made his own decisions again, which made the whole world ignore him.

senses.definition: 用喺形容詞後面，某樣嘢去到最大程度嘅意思 (extreme)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.translation: Extremely happy

senses.definition: 指戰鬥能力或實力，通常會係動漫、遊戲到出現。 (military strength, often used in anime, games, etc)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢嘅戰力高到可以一拳打死隻boss。
examples.translation: His military strength is too high. He can kill the boss in one punch.

senses.definition: 指人嘅精神狀態或者行動力 (a person’s mental state or mobility)

examples.text: 以我而家嘅戰力，玩到聽朝10點都冇問題。
examples.translation: In my current state, I can play until 10 o'clock in the morning without any problem.

senses.definition: 一系列能夠識別歸類嘅症狀；呢個叫法喺臺灣/日本比較常見，而香港比較常用 #綜合症 (syndrome; used more often in Taiwan or Japanese contexts; in Hong Kong #綜合症 is used more often)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: cong3 soeng1 hau6 aat3 lik6 zing3 hau6 kwan4
examples.translation: Post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD)

senses.definition: 和製漢字，即係 #壽司；常見於壽司店嘅店名 (Japanese kanji for sushi, commonly seen in the names of sushi restaurants)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition:
小稱詞綴，表示可愛、親近之意；由日文嘅「ちゃん」嘅讀音直譯做中文，「醬」只係形聲字；用普通話嘅讀音會比較傳神，但係中港台都有使用 ("-chan", a diminutive suffix borrowed from Japanese
jpn:ちゃん)
senses.label: 詞綴

senses.definition: 正文嘅部分，通常指小説、漫畫、電影等作品入面嘅主要故事 (main story of novels, comics, and movies etc.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: Forrest Gump

senses.definition: 一種#數學 嘅應用，以#機率、線性代數等方法作出風險估算 (actuarial science)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 身體或物體嘅側邊 (the side of an object or body)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個女仔無論側面定正面睇都好靚。
examples.translation: This girl looks so pretty no matter from the side or from the front.

senses.definition: 揸緊時間，唔放過一分一秒，尤其喺時間緊迫，需要盡快完成某啲嘢嘅時候 (to race against the clock)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 考試時間淨番一分鐘，考生都爭分奪秒，完成最後一條題目。
examples.jyutping: haau2 si3 si4 gaan3 zing6 faan1 jat1 fan1 zung1, haau2 sang1 dou1 zang1 fan1 dyut6 miu5, jyun4 sing4 zeoi3 hau6 jat1 tiu4 tai4 muk6.
examples.translation: There is still one minute until the end of the exam. All examinees are racing against time to complete the last question.

senses.definition: #傍晚 時分落到地面嘅#太陽（量詞：個／輪） (the setting sun; sunset)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 heoi3 hoi2 bin1 tai2 zik6 joeng4.
examples.translation: We went to the seaside to watch the sunset.

senses.definition: 做面部清潔護膚療程 (to have a facial treatment)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢哋好似每個月都會去做兩次facial。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 hou2 ci5 mui5 go3 jyut6 dou1 wui5 heoi3 zou6 loeng5 ci3 fei1 sou4.
examples.translation: It seems like they get facials twice a month.

senses.definition: 動物體內嘅脂肪細胞，用嚟儲藏養分，保持體温 (animal fat cell, tissue)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 肥豬肉有好多脂肪㗎，唔好食咁多喇！
examples.jyutping: fei4 zyu1 juk6 jau5 hou2 do1 zi1 fong1 gaa3, m4 hou2 sik6 gam3 do1 laa3!
examples.translation: Fat pork has lots of fat, don't eat too much of it!

senses.definition: #脂肪酸，通常#固態 叫脂肪，#液態 叫#油 (solid state of fatty acid)
轉彎嘅位，或者兩條街相交嘅位置 (street corner; the point of intersection of one street with another)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢條街轉角有間麪包鋪。
examples.translation: There is a bakery at the corner of this street.

senses.definition: 轉彎嘅位，或者兩條街相交嘅位置 (street corner; the point of intersection of one street with another)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢條街轉角位有間麪包鋪。
examples.translation: There is a bakery at the corner of this street.

senses.definition: 有房租俾人作短暫住宿嘅地方；同#旅館 比，價錢貴啲，設備好啲，而且服務多啲（量詞：間） (hotel)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ng5 sing1 kap1 zau2 dim3
examples.translation: five-star hotel

senses.definition: #送殯 (to attend a funeral)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #豬 嘅肉，尤其指用嚟食嘅 (pork)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 即係#企 (to stand; to stay upright)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: baa1 si2 soeng6 cang4 m4 ho2 ji5 kei5.
examples.translation: No standing on the upper deck.

senses.definition: 指控某人犯罪或惡行嘅名稱（量詞：項） (charge; accusation; crime one is accused of)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢殺人罪名成立，判處終身監禁。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 saat3 jan4 zeoi6 ming4 sing4 laap6, pun3 cyu5 zung1 san1 gaam1 gam3.
examples.translation: He has been convicted of murder, and is sentenced to life imprisonment.

senses.definition: 做錯嘢俾人鬧 (to rebuke; to reprimand; to scold)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zou6 co3 je5 bei2 lou5 si1 naau6.
examples.translation: The teacher rebuked me for doing something wrong.

senses.definition: 最低限度 (refers to the lower bound of a quantity; at least; a minimum of)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 今年至少有十萬人出嚟遊行。
examples.jyutping: gam1 nin2 zi3 siu2 jau5 sap6 maan6 jan4 ceot1 lei4 jau4 hang4.
examples.translation: There are at least 100,000 people who've come to the protest this year.

senses.definition: #起碼；用嚟講最低嘅要求、期望 (used to suggest a minimal expectation; at least)

examples.text: 至少我都叫做幫過手，你呢？
examples.jyutping: zi3 siu2 ngo5 dou1 giu3 zou6 bong1 gwo3 sau2, nei5 ne1?
examples.translation: At least I have given some help, but how about you?

senses.definition: #起碼；用嚟指出積極嘅一面，儘管有明顯嘅消極方面 (indicates a positive aspect despite apparent downsides; if nothing else; at least)

examples.text: 至少對我嚟講，出名係一個負擔
examples.jyutping: zi3 siu2 deoi3 ngo5 lei4 gong2, ceot1 ming4 hai6 jat1 go3 fu6 daam1
examples.translation: At least for me, being famous would be a burden.

senses.definition: 類似#雖然 ，表示轉折嘅意思 (even if; even though; despite)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 儘管我冇咩錢，但我都會幫你。
examples.jyutping: zeon6 gun2 ngo5 mou5 me1 cin2, daan6 ngo5 dou1 wui5 bong1 nei5.
examples.translation: Even if I don't have that much money, I will try my best to help you.

senses.definition: 最低限度 (refers to the lower bound of a quantity; at least; a minimum of)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: gaa3 ce1 zeoi3 siu2 zoi3 zyu6 sap6 go3 jan4.
examples.translation: There were ten people in the car, at least.

senses.definition: #起碼；用嚟講最低嘅要求、期望 (used to suggest a minimal expectation; at least)

examples.text: 你幾忙都好，最少都打個電話返嚟吖。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gei2 mong4 dou1 hou2, zeoi3 siu2 dou1 daa2 go3 din6 waa2 faan1 lai4 aa1.
examples.translation: No matter how busy you are, you could at least give us a call.

senses.definition: 比喻#競爭 (figuratively: to compete)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
喺宴會上#祝酒，向來賓所講嘅#祝願 及#感謝 説話（量詞：段） (toasting speech)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 宴會或者聚餐開始前祝賀嘉賓 ((of feasts) to drink a toast; to propose a toast; to toast)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zuk1 zau2 ci4
examples.translation: a toasting speech

senses.definition: #香港 地區名；位於#九龍，喺#黃大仙 嘅東面，#慈雲山 嘅南面；係由石礦場發展而成嘅住宅區 (Diamond Hill)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 鑽石山嘅志蓮淨苑模仿唐朝嘅建築。
examples.jyutping: zyun3 sek6 saan1 ge3 zi3 lin4 zing6 jyun2 mou4 fong2 tong4 ciu4 ge3 gin3 zuk1.
examples.translation: Chi Lin Nunnery in Diamond Hill is modeled after the architecture of the Tang Dynasty.

#姪仔 嘅#老婆 (the wife of one's nephew)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 抑制#中樞神經 嘅藥物，有放鬆神經、鎮定情緒、減低焦慮同埋令人昏睡嘅作用 (sedative; tranquilliser)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 陷害、對付、告發一個人；警察捉到疑犯後，揾證據令佢入獄；有時會涉及#誣告 同堆砌假證供等；參考：#煮重米 (to setup, to pick on, to snitch on someone; after police officer has caught a suspect, to collect evidence and put him in jail; sometimes implies false accusation or made-up evidence; literally: to cook die)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我同你咁耐兄弟，點解你要煮死我？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 tung4 nei5 gam3 noi6 hing1 dai6, dim2 gaai2 nei5 jiu3 zyu2 sei2 ngo5?
examples.translation: We've been bros for long, why you set me up?

senses.definition: 唔小心露出性感部位 (to expose oneself inadvertently, often used in a sexual way; literally: to run light)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 嗰個女歌星成日著埋啲咁性感嘅裙，都唔知係咪想特登走光搏出位。
examples.translation: The actress often wears revealing dresses, isn't she trying to gain attention through her outfits?

senses.definition: 未沖洗嘅菲林唔小心曝咗光，用唔到 ((fig.) (of film) to be exposed to light)

examples.text: 啲菲林走咗光就晒唔到相架嚹。
examples.translation: If a film is exposed to light, the photos can't be developed.

senses.definition: 用嘢冚住；遮住 (to cover; to overspread)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: lung4 zaau3
examples.translation: to envelop; to shroud

senses.definition: 保護 (to protect)

examples.jyutping: m4 sai2 geng1. ngo5 sat6 zaau3 zyu6 nei5 gaak3.
examples.translation: Don't worry. I've got you covered!

senses.definition: 請人客當呢度係佢屋企得嘞，唔使咁拘謹 (to feel at home; to feel comfortable and relaxed)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 洗手間喺走廊尾，自便喇。
examples.jyutping: sai2 sau2 gaan1 hai2 zau2 long2 mei5, zi6 bin2 laa3.
examples.translation: The washroom is at the end of the corridor. Feel free to use it.

senses.definition: 要遷就或者顧忌某啲嘢咁去做 (to accommodate, to have scruple while doing something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 打大力啲！唔使就住佢呀。
examples.jyutping: daa2 daai6 lik6 di1! m4 sai2 zau6 zyu6 keoi5 aa3.
examples.translation: Hit him hard! Don't hold back!

senses.definition: 形容小心奕奕，甚至過份怕事、#驚青、#因住 (to play safe; to be afraid, to worry, to accommodate)

examples.text: 你做嘢咁就住就住唔得㗎，要大膽啲、爽快啲。
examples.jyutping: nei5 zou6 je5 gam3 zau6 zyu6 zau6 zyu6 m4 dak1 gaa3, jiu3 daai6 daam2 di1, song2 faai3 di1.
examples.translation: You shouldn't worry too much at work, just do it with guts and speed.

senses.definition: (中醫)食一啲嘢或做一啲舉措去補充#陰 液, 係一種治療#陰虛 嘅方法 ((of Chinese medicine) to eat something or to do some action to replenish the fluid of internal organs, a way to heal the deficiency of Yin; literally, to moisturize the Yin)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 形容一個人好注重自己健康，永遠食好瞓足、懂得#養生；又指人過份#錫身，做事太好整以暇、安全第一 (to describe someone who is so careful about one's body, who always eat healthy, have plenty of rest, fond of preserving one's health; also describe someone being too careful in work, who always act slowly and safely)

examples.text: 佢好滋陰㗎，好識進補，出街仲一定帶住個暖壺飲暖水。
examples.translation: He's very health-conscious; he always carries a thermos of warm water.

senses.definition: 用嚟控制機器開關或者運作嘅裝置（量詞：個／粒） (a button; a switch)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hoi1 gwaan1 zai3
examples.translation: the power button

senses.definition: 剎車裝置（量詞：個） (a brake)

examples.jyutping: laai1 sau2 zai3
examples.translation: to put the handbrake on

senses.definition: 以傳統嘅中國醫學系統醫治病人嘅#醫生（量詞：個） (Traditional Chinese Medicine practitioner; Chinese Medicine practitioner)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我病咗好耐都唔好，阿媽叫我試吓睇中醫。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 beng6 zo2 hou2 noi6 dou1 m4 hou2, aa3 maa1 giu3 ngo5 si3 haa5 tai2 zung1 ji1.
examples.translation: I have been sick for a long time. Mum suggested me to see a Chinese Medicine practitioner.

senses.definition: 一種基於#陰陽五行 學説，透過#望、#聞、#問、#切 嘅方法辨證，然後制定治療方法嘅#醫學。中醫嘅治療模式包括#中藥、#針灸、#推拿 同#跌打 等。廣義嘅中醫學甚至有預防醫學嘅雛型喺裏面，就係所謂嘅「#治未病」。 (Traditional Chinese Medicine; Chinese Medicine)

examples.text: 啲人話中醫冇副作用，係咪真㗎？
examples.jyutping: di1 jan4 waa6 zung1 ji1 mou5 fu3 zok3 jung6, hai6 mai6 zan1 gaa3?
examples.translation: Many people claim that Traditional Chinese Medicine has no side effects, is that true?

senses.definition: 做嘢快手；事情發生得快 (quickly; immediately)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: zaa4 zaa2 seng1 sik6 saai3 wun2 faan6.
examples.translation: The bowl of rice was eaten up quickly.

senses.definition: #液體，如水，將其他固體包圍住 (to flood with liquid, eg water)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zam6 can1
examples.translation: to be drowned

senses.definition: 祈禱、祈求 (to pray ; to wish ; express good wishes ; blessing)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zuk1 nei5 saang1 jat6 faai3 lok6!
examples.translation: Happy birthday to you!

senses.definition: 慶賀、頌賀 (celebrate)

examples.text: 老公訂咗間餐廳同我慶祝十週年結婚紀念。
examples.jyutping: lou5 gung1 deng6 zo2 gaan1 caan1 teng1 tung4 ngo5 hing3 zuk1 sap6 zau1 nin4 git3 fan1 gei2 nim6.
examples.translation: My husband booked a restaurant to celebrate our tenth wedding anniversary.

senses.definition: 同自己揾麻煩；令自己身陷#險境 (to make trouble for oneself; to shoot yourself in the foot, to cause unnecessary difficulties for oneself; literally: to grab worm and put it up one's arse)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我一早叫你唔好插手㗎啦，咪盞捉蟲入屎忽！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jat1 zou2 giu3 nei5 m4 hou2 caap3 sau2 gaa3 laa1, mai6 zaan2 zuk1 cung4 jap6 si2 fat1!
examples.translation: I told you not to get involved in my business. Now you're causing trouble for yourself.

senses.definition: 持有或者擁有一啲嘢，作為保證或者交換條件 (to have something in hand as an assurance)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你冇着數俾佢揸手，佢唔會幫你㗎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 mou5 zoek6 sou3 bei2 keoi5 zaa1 sau2, keoi5 m4 wui5 bong1 nei5 gaa3.
examples.translation: He won't help you unless you give him something in return.

senses.definition: 用手#握 住 (to hold; to grasp)

examples.jyutping: ni1 baa2 so1 gei2 hou2 zaa1 sau2 wo3.
examples.translation: This comb is quite easy to hold.

senses.definition: 即係#握手 (to shake hands)
較早一段日子 (some days earlier)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 zou2 paai4 dou1 jau5 daa2 bei2 keoi5 gaa3!
examples.translation: I called him some days ago.

senses.definition: 形容遇到不幸嘅事、突發壞事、或發生不由自主嘅失誤，就好似受到鬼魂影響咁樣 (to describe the scene when one meet mistunfortune, accident or bad happens suddenly, or made an involuntarily mistake, just like irritated by a ghost. Literally: to encounter a ghost)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我今朝好似撞鬼咁，唔見咗個銀包仲差啲俾車撞親。
examples.translation: It seems I was haunted this morning, I lost my wallet and then nearly hit by a car.

senses.definition: 抒發感情果陣用嘅，多數係遇到突發而令人驚訝、中度震驚、滋擾嘅事 (an exclamation of surprise, mild shock, or irritation, like "blast!", "whoops!"; "damn!".)

examples.translation: Damn ! Where's my wallet ?

senses.definition: 行走自如、無拘無束 (to be in a field freely; to be in a field with great ease)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我縱橫情場咁多年，從來未試過真心鍾意一個人。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zung1 waang4 cing4 coeng4 gam3 do1 nin4, cung4 loi4 mei6 si3 gwo3 zan1 sam1 zung1 ji3 jat1 go3 jan4.
examples.translation: Though I've been in the dating scene for years, I've never truly fallen for anyone.

senses.definition: 一條河嘅中間位置 (midstream; middle reaches)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: I'm around average in my class, with scores close to the class average in all subjects.

senses.definition: 利用他人取得利益後，即置諸不顧；多用於性愛、愛情方面 (to not take any responsibility after exploiting others for self-interest; especially referring to abandoning somebody after having sex with him/her; to not take any responsibility)

examples.text: 佢真係好慘，俾男朋友𡁻完鬆。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zan1 hai6 hou2 caam2, bei2 naam4 pang4 jau5 ziu6 jyun4 sung1.

senses.definition: 征服、吞併、控制、得到 (to conquer; to embrace, extend and extinguish; to control; to gain)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 tung4 nei5 gong2, tiu4 neoi2 ngo5 zek1 ngaang6 aa3!

senses.definition: 讚一個人嘅行為或者才能所講嘅説話 (compliment; appreciation)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 ge3 coi4 gon3 dak1 dou3 bat1 siu2 jan4 ge3 zaan3 soeng2.

senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: sap6 nin4 mou5 gin3, nei5 zung6 hai6 gam3 hau6 saang1.
examples.translation: We have not seen each other for ten years; still, you look young.

senses.definition: #茶餐廳 用語，只係叫嘢飲，唔叫嘢食 (usually used in Hong Kong-style cafe, ordering drinks only, without any food)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zing6 jam2 soeng1 gai3
examples.translation: double price for just drink

senses.definition: 經歷一連串唔同階段嘅小變化，一啲跟住一啲噉發展 (gradually)

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA

senses.definition: 唔#儆惜 咁使用一樣嘢，好差噉對待一樣嘢 (to abuse; to waste; to ruin)

examples.jyutping: zou1 taap3 loeng6 sik6
examples.translation: to waste food

senses.definition: 一啲本身高雅嘅嘢，俾一啲唔識欣賞或低俗嘅人使用 (something valuable or classy used by somebody who is inferior or who does not appreciate)

examples.text: 我哋唔識飲酒，無謂糟蹋咗你呢支三十年嘅靚嘢啦。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 m4 sik1 jam2 zau2, mou4 wai6 zou1 taap3 zo2 nei5 nei1 zi1 saam1 sap6 nin4 ge3 leng3 je5 laa1.
examples.translation: We're not wine connoisseurs, don't waste this 30-year bottle of wine on us.

senses.definition: 回復返去原本狀態嘅時間（量詞：個） (cycle; period (of time))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ging1 zai3 zau1 kei4
examples.translation: economic cycle

senses.definition: 形容有決心去達到目標或者得到某樣嘢 (to be determined to achieve a goal or a thing)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 冠軍寶座，我哋志在必得。
examples.jyutping: gun3 gwan1 bou2 zo6, ngo5 dei6 zi3 zoi6 bit1 dak1.

senses.definition: 幫大肚婆生#蘇蝦，從子宮產出 (to practice midwifery)

examples.text: 我生兩個仔都係黃醫生接生嘅。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 saang1 loeng5 go3 zai2 dou1 hai6 wong4 ji1 sang1 zip3 saang1 ge3.
examples.translation: Both of my sons were delivered by Doctor Wong.

senses.definition: 一個人用以平時出入嘅私家車；多數指唔平嘅房車或者跑車 (one's vehicle or car; often refers to a saloon/sedan or a sports car)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 有個高官喺外遊時發生交通意外，對撼嘅私家車竟然係藝人嘅座駕。
examples.jyutping: jau5 go3 gou1 gun1 hai2 ngoi6 jau4 si4 faat3 saang1 gaau1 tung1 ji3 ngoi6, deoi3 ham6 ge3 si1 gaa1 ce1 ging2 jin4 hai6 ngai6 jan4 ge3 zo6 gaa3

senses.definition: 行動快速嘅擬聲詞 (onomatopoeia of quick movement)

examples.translation: X

senses.definition: 食嘢食到好嘈嘅聲音 (the sound of munching food loudly)

examples.jyutping: sik6 je5 sik6 dou3 zep4 zep2 seng1
examples.translation: to chew the food noisily

senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 自然界弱肉強食，係一個好殘忍嘅世界。
examples.jyutping: zi6 jin4 gaai3 joek6 juk6 koeng4 sik6, hai6 jat1 go3 hou2 caan4 jan2 ge3 sai3 gaai3.
examples.translation: In nature it's either kill or be killed. It's a cruel world.

senses.definition: 做一套#電影 或者其他藝術作品嘅#導演，指導成個拍攝或者表演嘅過程 (to direct a film or play, as a director)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 喺其他國家、地區運啲貨物入嚟 (to import goods)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zeon3 hau2 jat1 pai3 leng3 caa4 jip6
examples.translation: to import a batch of high quality tea leaves

senses.definition: 一種冇固定間隔，可以自由砌埋同分隔嘅#櫃（量詞：個） (combined cabinets)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 因為冇人陪伴、明白而唔開心，感到#空虛、#苦悶、#無聊 (lonely; forlorn; describes a negative feeling due to a lack of company)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢一個人住，所以成日都覺得寂寞。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 go3 jan4 zyu6, so2 ji5 seng4 jat6 dou1 gok3 dak1 zik6 mok6.
examples.translation: She lives alone, and thus often feels lonely.

senses.definition: 賣咗原本喺一個國家、地方嘅資產，轉而投資喺另一個國家 (to invest in a different country, location, by selling the original assets)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #裁剪#布匹 (to cut a cloth)

jyutping: zap1 tiu4 mat6 daai2 leoi6 san1 gaa1

senses.definition: 寓意啲人因小失大。 (to lose something substantial just because gaining some trifles; be penny-wise and pound-foolish; literally:to pick up a garter but lose all of one's property)
senses.label: 語句

keywords: zap1 tiu4 mat6 daai2 leoi6 san1 gaa1
zap tiu mat daai leoi san gaa

senses.definition: 為咗享受而進行#性行為，一般嚟講，祇會形容人同人之間嘅性行為 (to make love; to have sex (normally between human beings))
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 組成，構成 (to form a portion of a total; to be a part of)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 失業人數佔勞動人口百分之七。
examples.jyutping: sat1 jip6 jan4 sou3 zim3 lou4 dung6 jan4 hau2 baak3 fan6 zi1 cat1.
examples.translation: The unemployed account for 7% of the working population.

senses.definition: 取得某個地位或形勢 (to obtain a certain status)

examples.jyutping: zim3 soeng6 fung1
examples.translation: to be at an advantage; to have an edge

senses.definition: 保住自己嘅利益或者安全 (to secure one's own interests or safety)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 亂世動蕩，人人自保求存。
examples.jyutping: lyun6 sai3 dung6 dong6, jan4 jan4 zi6 bou2 kau4 cyun4.
examples.translation: In the chaotic era, people protected themselves for their own survival.

senses.definition: 由人民直接選出議員或政府長官（量詞：次） (direct election)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: dei6 keoi1 zik6 syun2
examples.translation: (directly elected) geographical constituencies

senses.definition: 香港嘅政治用語，指聲稱自己政治立場係#左翼，支持改變社會制度以令社會喺資源、財富分配上較公平，但係因為過份強調「大愛」而盲目追求和諧同包容嘅人；佢哋行為上往往偏於空口講白話、自打嘴巴甚至背道而馳，所以被稱為「#膠」（戇居、思想言論唔合邏輯嘅人）；亦都泛指所有唔係#本土派 嘅人（量詞：個） (a contemporary term in the Hong Kong political scene referring to persons who identify as left-wing and advocate for more just and fair wealth redistribution, but often waffle or are unable to put their theories into practice; the term is often used to refer to the left-wing liberals, pan-democrats, and those who support a "peaceful, rational and non-violent" method of protest; the second character can also mean "idiotic," giving way to its pejorative use akin to "libtard")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 好多；非常多；通常用嚟表達講者嫌某啲嘢唔好或太多 (plenty of; a lot of; usually used when the speaker thinks there is too much of some negative thing)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: zyu1 do1 bat1 bin6
examples.translation: quite a lot of trouble; rather inconvenient

senses.definition: 影響；改變一樣嘢嘅方向 (to influence; to control)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zo2 jau6 daai6 guk6
examples.translation: to influence the situation

senses.definition: 用彷製珠寶嚟做嘅首飾 (accessories made of fake jewelry)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢啲朱義盛邊出得大場面。
examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 zyu1 ji5 sing2 bin1 ceot1 dak1 daai6 coeng4 min6.
examples.translation: These accessories are made of fake jewelry. How can they be brought into such an important occasion?

senses.definition: 要求人讓開 (ask others to give way)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: m4 goi1 ze3 ze3!
examples.translation: Excuse me please!

senses.definition: 字詞組成之後嘅表面意思，而唔係語用、語境或者文化背景下另外隱含嘅意思 (literal; literal meaning)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ziu3 zi6 min2 tai2
examples.translation: according to the literal meaning

senses.definition: 喺惡劣、險惡嘅環境之中好運咁#死裏逃生，甚至得到少許好處。 (to be lucky in a bad situation)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 咁都死唔去，都算執返一身彩喇。
examples.translation: Miraculously surviving that ordeal, I think I'm pretty lucky.

senses.definition: 將人或者事物加埋一齊嘅形式（量詞：個／隊） (combination; union; group)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tau4 zi1 zou2 hap6
examples.translation: investment portfolio

senses.definition: 同對方表示，你將會按照佢嘅吩咐或者命令去做 (expression of compliance that conveys that a given order or instruction will be obeyed; copy that; roger)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: siu2 jan4 zeon1 ming6!
examples.translation: Yes, sir!

senses.definition: 令到數字、份量、性質多咗 (to increase; to raise; to add)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今個月失業率增加咗百分之零點二。
examples.jyutping: gam1 go3 jyut6 sat1 jip6 leot2 zang1 gaa1 zo2 baak3 fan6 zi1 ling4 dim2 ji6.
examples.translation: The unemployment rate has increased by 0.2% this month.

senses.definition: 臨場應變 (to adjust to changing circumstance; to act according to circumstances; to improvise; to ad lib; literally, to pick up life)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zou6 si1 ji4 jiu3 sik1 dak1 zap1 saang1 gaa3.
examples.translation: An MC must be able to act according to circumstances.

senses.definition: 引申解照顧自己 (to look after oneself)

examples.text: 你過到外國讀書，冇阿爸阿媽照顧你，自己要執生喇。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gwo3 dou3 ngoi6 gwok3 duk6 syu1, mou5 aa3 baa4 aa3 maa1 ziu3 gu3 nei5, zi6 gei2 jiu3 zap1 saang1 laa3.
examples.translation: When you study abroad, dad and mom can't take care of you and you will have to look after yourself.

senses.definition: 突然之間嘅 (sudden; abrupt)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: zaau6 jyu5
examples.translation: shower rain

senses.definition: #爭 著做某啲嘢 (rushing to do something)
senses.label: 副詞

senses.definition: 啱啱好；喺適當時間 (just in time; just right)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 lai4 dak1 zing3 hou2.
examples.translation: You arrive just in time.

senses.definition: 啱啱好、咁啱；恰巧、正好 (coincidentally)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: gam3 ngaam1 lou6 gwo3
examples.translation: passing by coincidentally

senses.definition: 切斷纜繩 (to cut ropes)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 火勢咁猛，再唔斬纜就火燒連環船㗎喇！
examples.jyutping: fo2 sai3 gam3 maang5, zoi3 m4 zaam2 laam2 zau6 fo2 siu1 lin4 waan4 syun4 gaa3 laa3!
examples.translation: Fire! Cut the ropes quickly or the fire will spread to the other ships!

senses.definition: 終結關係；一刀兩斷；分手並且劃清界線 (to sever ties; to sever relationships, especially romantic relationships)

examples.text: 佢父母唔鍾意嗰個女仔，逼佢哋斬纜。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fu6 mou5 m4 zung1 ji3 go2 go3 neoi5 zai2, bik1 keoi5 dei6 zaam2 laam2.
examples.translation: His parents dislike his girlfriend and are forcing him to break up with her.

senses.definition: 終止一啲已經開始咗嘅項目 (to stop an on-going project, event, etc.)

examples.text: 個節目拍咗十幾集無端端斬纜，一定有內情。
examples.jyutping: go3 zit3 muk6 paak3 zo2 sap6 gei2 zaap6 mou4 dyun1 dyun1 zaam2 laam2, jat1 ding6 jau5 noi6 cing4.
examples.translation: This television show was suddenly discontinued after being broadcast for more than ten episodes. Something is not right.

senses.definition: 終止投資，避免承受更多損失 (to sell off an investment and to cut losses)

examples.text: 呢間公司一年蝕咗幾億，啲股東都急住斬纜。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 gung1 si1 jat1 nin4 sit6 zo2 gei2 jik1, di1 gu2 dung1 dou1 gap1 zyu6 zaam2 laam2.
examples.translation: This company lost many tens of billions of dollars last year. Investors are scurrying to sell the stock to cut losses.

senses.definition: #哲學 用語，一種#理性 行動者所擁有嘅能力，可以喺唔同嘅選擇中#揀 自己嘅#行動 (free will)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 一個有盜竊癖嘅人根本無自由意志去揀唔偷嘢。
examples.jyutping: jat1 go3 jau5 dou6 sit3 pik1 ge3 jan4 gan1 bun2 mou5 zi6 jau4 ji3 zi3 heoi3 gaan2 m4 tau1 je5.
examples.translation: A kleptomaniac has no free will not to steal things.

senses.definition: 做手勢；施展身體語言 (to gesticulate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢一路講一路喺度指手劃腳。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 lou6 gong2 jat1 lou6 hai2 dou6 zi2 sau2 waak6 goek3.
examples.translation: He gesticulates as he talks.

senses.definition: 指指點點，但又唔落手做 (to order people about and to find fault with)

examples.text: 你唔係做就唔好喺度指手劃腳啦！
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hai6 zou6 zau6 m4 hou2 hai2 dou6 zi2 sau2 waak6 goek3 laa1!
examples.translation: If you are not working, don't try to order us about.

senses.definition: 選擇自己嘅#伴侶、#配偶，通常指結婚對象 (to select one's spouse)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zaak6 ngau5 tiu4 gin6
examples.translation: conditions of selecting one's spouse

senses.definition: 指一個人嘅言行前後#抵觸。 (to be inconsistent; to contradict oneself.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個小販話佢賣嘅矛最鋒利，又話佢嘅盾最堅硬，咁講唔係自相矛盾咩！
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 siu2 faan2 waa6 keoi5 maai6 ge3 maau4 zeoi3 fung1 lei6, jau6 waa6 keoi5 ge3 teon5 zeoi3 gin1 ngaang6, gam2 gong2 m4 hai6 zi6 soeng1 maau4 teon5 me1!
examples.translation: This hawker says the lance that he's selling is the sharpest and his shield is the most rigid. Isn't he contradicting himself?

senses.definition: 已經預備好，事前嘅準備功夫做完晒 (ready; prepared)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: We're all set, let's get going.

senses.definition: 女性傭人；請返嚟屋企做家務嘅女性員工 (female house helper; female domestic helper)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 女性清潔工 (female janitor)

examples.translation: female janitor

senses.definition: 由政府或者專業機構發出，證明一個人具備相關資格，可以執行、從事特殊工作，或者操控機械嘅牌照（量詞：個／張） (licence; permit; document issued by government or professional body indicating that the holder has attained qualifications to perform a job or a specific task, or operate specific machinery, etc.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gaa3 sai2 zap1 ziu3
examples.translation: driving licence

senses.definition: 指唔肯定時間嘅將來，帶有越早越好嘅期望 (as soon as possible)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: zou2 jat6 hong1 fuk6
examples.translation: get well soon

senses.definition: 根據法律懲罰違規嘅人或者團體 (to punish; to sanction (a person or a group) according to law)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 犯咗罪，就應該受到法律嘅制裁。
examples.jyutping: faan6 zo2 zeoi6, zau6 jing1 goi1 sau6 dou3 faat3 leot6 ge3 zai3 coi4.
examples.translation: Those who commit crimes must face legal consequences.

senses.definition: 變到冇用，失去效力 (to become invalid)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zoeng1 gaau1 jik6 zok3 fai3
examples.translation: to set aside a transaction

senses.definition: #最後；#結果 (eventually; in the end)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: jan4 zung1 gwai1 wui5 jau5 jat1 sei2.
examples.translation: All human beings must face death eventually.

senses.definition: 鑲嵌上#鑽石 嘅#戒指（量詞：隻） (diamond ring)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: neoi5 jan2 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 sau1 dou2 zyun3 gaai3.
examples.translation: Women adore receiving diamond rings.

senses.definition: 包括所有嘢，集合埋一齊 (to sum up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zung2 kut3 ji4 jin4
examples.translation: to draw a conclusion

senses.definition: 真實確切 (clear)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 對一個問題無真切理解就唔應該妄下結論。
examples.jyutping: deoi3 jat1 go3 man6 tai4 mou5 zan1 cit3 lei5 gaai2 zau6 m4 jing1 goi1 mong5 haa6 git3 leon6.
examples.translation: One shouldn't rush to judgment without a thorough understanding.

senses.definition: 形容一件事經過長時間嘅過程之後，最後實現到 (finally; eventually; at last)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: mung6 soeng2 zung1 jyu1 sing4 zan1.
examples.translation: The dream has finally come true.

senses.definition: 喺一個正式場合發表演説 (to deliver a speech)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: haau6 zoeng2 wai6 bat1 jip6 lai5 zi3 ci4.
examples.translation: The principal delivered a speech at the graduation ceremony.

senses.definition: 一個人主要打嘅#工，比較穩定，會將大部分做嘢嘅時間都擺落去，而且有人工出 (occupation; profession)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zik1 jip6 beng6
examples.translation: occupational disease

senses.definition: 為對方祈願，希望好事會發生喺對方身上 (to bless; to wish)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 cung4 sam1 leoi5 min6 zuk1 fuk1 keoi5 dei6.
examples.translation: I genuinely wish them well from the bottom of my heart.

senses.definition: 令一個人嘅#福氣 變少 (to ruin one's good fortune through the acquisition of an undeserved fortune or through enjoying comfort extravagantly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 gam3 saai1 je5 wui5 zit3 fuk1 gaa3!
examples.translation: Being wasteful is bad for your karma.

senses.definition: 好#尖 (very sharp)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zi1 jyun4 bat1 paau4 dou3 zim1 bat1 lat1.
examples.translation: The pencil is extremely sharp.

senses.definition: 用嚟講一件事嘅#自然 結果 (naturally; after a while; used to describe the natural consequence of certain action or inaction)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 你氹吓佢，佢過一排自自然會原諒你啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 tam3 haa5 keoi5, keoi5 gwo3 jat1 paai4 zi6 zi6 jin4 wui5 jyun4 loeng6 nei5 laa1.
examples.translation: Try to do something nice for her; she'll forgive you eventually.

senses.definition: 形容一切道德唔可以接受嘅行為；#下流、#低莊、#可鄙、#低級、#無恥 (morally unacceptable; despicable; mean; contemptible; a bad character, a "low-life", "scum")
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢份人好賤格，成日都講埋晒啲咸濕嘢。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan6 jan4 hou2 zin6 gaak3, seng4 jat6 dou1 gong2 maai4 saai3 di1 haam4 sap1 je5.
examples.translation: He is despicable that he often talks about those off-colour things.

senses.definition: #五覺 其中一種，皮膚掂到外物所產生嘅感覺 (sense of touch; tactile sensation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我俾塊牌打到麻痹咗觸覺。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 bei2 faai3 paai2 daa2 dou3 maa4 bei3 zo2 zuk1 gok3.
examples.translation: I got hit by a banner and now I've lost all sensation.

senses.definition: 喺中午之前食嘅正餐；早上食嘅第一餐（量詞：餐／份） (breakfast)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你唔食早餐，邊有力氣做嘢？
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 sik6 zou2 caan1, bin1 jau5 lik6 hei3 zou6 je5?
examples.translation: If you don't eat breakfast, you won't have enough energy to work.

senses.definition: 刪剪影片中唔要嘅部份，或改變影片中情節或語句出現嘅時間長度或先後順序 (cut video; edit video)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 剪片嗰陣幫我將會展個shot擺響片頭
examples.translation: When editing, please place the shot of HKCEC at the start of the video.

senses.definition: 非常緊要嘅#勸告、#建議（量詞：點／個） (serious advice)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢唔肯聽我嘅忠告，我可以點做？
examples.jyutping: keoi5 m4 hang2 teng1 ngo5 ge3 zung1 guk1, ngo5 ho2 ji5 dim2 zou6?
examples.translation: He wouldn't listen to my advice! What could I do?

senses.definition: 對人或事物產生極大興趣、被吸引，難以抽離 (to be fascinated; to be captivated; to be obsessed with; to be infatuated with)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: wai6 nei5 zoek6 mai4
examples.translation: to be obsessed with her

senses.definition: 單挑；一個人打一個人 (to have a one-against-one fight)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 隻抽？你都癡線嘅，梗係圍毆㗎啦！
examples.jyutping: zek3 cau1? nei5 dou1 ci1 sin3 ge3, gang2 hai6 wai4 au2 gaa3 laa1!
examples.translation: One-on-one? LOL. We'll definitely gang up on you!

senses.definition: 利用言語或者行為去#激嬲 人 (to provoke, to make angry)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你而家係咪想捽㷫我先？
examples.jyutping: nei5 ji4 gaa1 hai6 mai6 soeng2 zeot1 hing3 ngo5 sin1?
examples.translation: Are you trying to make me angry?

senses.definition: 藉口去廁所而逃走 (using the excuse of having to defecate in order to escape)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 個差佬咁蠢㗎，畀個疑犯借屎遁走甩咗！
examples.jyutping: go3 caai1 lou2 gam3 ceon2 gaa3, bei2 go3 ji4 faan2 ze3 si2 deon6 zau2 lat1 zo2!
examples.translation: What an idiotic cop! The suspect escaped by claiming he needed to use the bathroom.

senses.definition: 一個字按照書寫標準嘅寫法，同#俗字 相對（量詞：個／隻） (a character that follows the stroke and radical composition of the orthographical standard)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zing3 zi6 faat3
examples.translation: standard orthography

senses.definition: 業餘愛好者對自己推崇嘅罕用寫法嘅稱呼（量詞：個／隻） (a term used by amateur etymologists to refer to their rarely used recommended characters)

examples.text: 你用埋晒啲正字寫廣東話，冇人睇得明㗎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jung6 maai4 saai3 di1 zing3 zi6 se2 gwong2 dung1 waa2, mou5 jan4 tai2 dak1 ming4 gaa3.
examples.translation: You're using "canonical" Cantonese characters in your writing, no one will understand you.

senses.definition: 鍾意明星、偶像，而捕捉佢哋嘅動向，追隨佢哋，例如喺佢哋會亮相嘅場合守候 (to be a superfan of celebrities, to the extent that one would follow them to wherever they make public appearances)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋去#五台山 追星囉！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 heoi3 ng5 toi4 saan1 zeoi1 sing1 lo3!
examples.translation: Let's go to Five Stations Hill to see celebrities!

senses.definition: 知道自己嘅地位或者職責；知道是非輕重；知道規則、潛規則，唔會亂嚟 (to know what one is doing; to know one's place; to understand the rules of the game)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: maai5 gun1 coi4 m4 zi1 deng6
examples.translation: to have no idea what one is provoking

senses.definition: 以前做完壞事，而家生活境況困苦，就好似有#報應 咁 (suffering; in a very bad condition (usually of people who had been very mean and bad to others and punished by divine retribution))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 以前對面間酒樓嗰個無良僱主而家折墮到要乞食啊。
examples.jyutping: ji5 cin4 deoi3 min6 gaan1 zau2 lau4 go2 go3 mou4 loeng4 gu3 zyu2 ji4 gaa1 zit3 do6 dou3 jiu3 hat1 sik6 aa3.
examples.translation: The restaurant owner who once cheated his employees is now begging on the streets, seemingly punished by fate.

senses.definition: 行為唔#道德 (morally degrading and unacceptable)

examples.text: 而家啲學生居然做啲噉嘅事，真係折墮！
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 di1 hok6 saang1 geoi1 jin2 zou6 di1 gam2 ge3 si6, zan1 hai6 zit3 do6!
examples.translation: It's a shame that students would do such thing now!

senses.definition: 順住事情發展，係符合預期嘅結果 (automatically; naturally; in the ordinary course of events)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 你聽話，爸爸媽媽自然就會錫你。
examples.jyutping: nei5 teng1 waa6, baa4 baa1 maa4 maa1 zi6 jin4 zau6 wui5 sek3 nei5.
examples.translation: If you're a good boy/girl, mummy and daddy will certainly love you.

senses.definition: #種植 ；提供合適嘅環境同養份，令植物生長 (to cultivate; to grow plants)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zung3 faa1
examples.translation: to plant flowers

senses.definition: 將建築物嘅一部份穩固咁起喺地底 (to build a part of a structure below the surface in a stable manner)

examples.text: 防波堤係種喺海上面嘅建築。
examples.jyutping: fong4 bo1 tai4 hai6 zung3 hai2 hoi2 soeng6 min6 ge3 gin3 zuk1
examples.translation: A breakwater is a structure built out into the sea to protect against waves.

senses.definition: #種牙 (to install a dental implant)
用各種方法對另一個人表示出嬲怒嘅心情，包括埋怨、呻、鬧；遷怒於、怪罪於另一個人 (to express upset, to show anger to somebody, by complaining, moaning, scolding etc; to complain against, to be angry with another person)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to be very angry with someone, to strongly complain against someone

senses.definition: 詐刑 - 假裝對囚犯行死刑但響最後一刻唔執行，用嚟精神虐待或逼供 (to bluff, to act the role of, to pretend, to play the fool)
引伸指又肥又醜嘅女性（量詞：件） (figuratively refers to a fat and ugly woman)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 正所謂豬扒都係肉，好過去自瀆。
examples.jyutping: zing3 so2 wai6 zyu1 paa2 dou1 hai6 juk6, hou2 gwo3 heoi3 zi6 zuk6.
examples.translation: Like the old saying, banging "pork-chop" is better than jerking off.

senses.definition: 指住桑樹鬧槐樹；比喻表面上鬧甲，實際上係鬧乙 (to criticize a person by criticizing another seemingly; literally: to criticize a pagoda tree by criticizing mulberry seemingly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢咁話我，其實係想指桑罵槐，鬧你！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam2 waa6 ngo5, kei4 sat6 hai6 soeng2 zi2 song1 maa6 waai4, naau6 nei5!
examples.translation: He seems to criticize me, but he's really talking about you.

senses.definition: 獄中術語，解「一個月」 (unit of one month of time to be served in prison)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.text: 條友單嘢最多咪幾隻，一碌都唔使就出返嚟啦！
examples.jyutping: tiu4 jau2 daan1 je5 zeoi3 do1 mai6 gei2 zek3, jat1 luk1 dou1 m4 sai2 zau6 ceot1 faan1 lai4 laa1!
examples.translation: The maximum sentence for his case should be no more than a few months; he should be released within a year!

senses.definition: #安裝 (to install)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 等我喺道門度裝返個鎖先。
examples.jyutping: dang2 ngo5 hai2 dou6 mun4 dou6 zong1 faan1 go3 so2 sin1.
examples.translation: Let me install a lock on the door.

senses.definition: 裝陷阱；設局#陷害 (to set (someone) up)

examples.text: 我摸戒指呢下小動作，係我最近五百鋪入面故意加上去嘅，愛嚟裝你呢隻老狐狸！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 mo2 gaai3 zi2 ni1 haa5 siu2 dung6 zok3, hai6 ngo5 zeoi3 gan6 ng5 baak3 pou1 jap6 min6 gu3 ji3 gaa1 soeng5 heoi3 ge3, oi3 lei4 zong1 nei5 ni1 zek3 lou5 wu4 lei2
examples.translation: My subtle gesture of touching my ring was intentionally added in my last 500 games, just to trap cunning players like you!

senses.definition: 即係#做場戲 (to create drama; to deceive, to set a trap, to put on a show or an act to deceive someone)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 父母一直都希望佢娶個好老婆，搞一場豪門夜宴，就算係#基 嘅都叫做為佢地家族做咗場好戲。
examples.translation: His parents always wanted him to marry a good wife and host a grand banquet, even though he is gay, as it would uphold their family's reputation.

senses.definition: 會令人更加容易生#癌 (to be carcinogenic)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 而家食紅肉又話致癌，飲熱茶又話致癌，咁乜都唔食煉仙好過啦？
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 sik6 hung4 juk6 jau6 waa6 zi3 ngaam4, jam2 jit6 caa4 jau6 waa6 zi3 ngaam4, gam2 mat1 dou1 m4 sik6 lin6 sin1 hou2 gwo3 laa1?
examples.translation: Eating red meat and drinking hot tea has been claimed to cause cancer, what can we do besides fasting for longevity?

senses.definition: 對一門學問或者手藝非常熟悉 (to be an expert or very experienced at something)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: caau2 gu2 piu3 ngo5 m4 zoi6 hong4.
examples.translation: I'm not good at stock trading.

senses.definition: 反問自己、反思自己做過嘅嘢 (to question oneself; to examine oneself)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 喺呢間公司做咗咁多年，自問盡忠職守，點解老闆要炒我呢？
examples.jyutping: hai2 ni1 gaan1 gung1 si1 zou6 zo2 gam3 do1 nin4, zi6 man6 zeon6 zung1 zik1 sau2, dim2 gaai2 lou5 baan2 jiu3 caau2 ngo5 ne1?
examples.translation: Having worked at this company for many years, I believed myself to be a loyal and responsible employee. Why did the boss fire me?

senses.definition: 一齊#打麻雀 嘅#朋友，類近#麻雀腳；或用嚟雅稱打麻雀嘅人（量詞：個） (friend or acquaintance who plays mahjong together; or elegant name of any person who plays mahjong)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 放假梗係約埋幾個雀友打返幾圈啦。
examples.jyutping: fong3 gaa3 gang2 hai6 joek3 maai4 gei2 go3 zoek3 jau5 daa2 faan1 gei2 hyun1 laa1
examples.translation: The best activity in the holiday is to date the mahjong mates to play a few rounds.

senses.definition: 養雀、玩雀嘅人 (person who raises and breeds birds)

examples.text: 以前興養雀嗰陣，啲雀友個個都帶住籠雀去茶樓，幾熱鬧。
examples.jyutping: ji5 cin4 hing1 joeng5 zoek3 go2 zan6, di1 zoek3 jau5 go3 go3 dou1 daai3 zyu6 lung4 zoek3 heoi3 caa4 lau4, gei2 jit6 naau6
examples.translation: In the old days when raising birds was a trend, all the the bird breeders would bring their birds with cages to the tea house. How lively it is!

senses.definition: 暗中採取唔光彩嘅手段、小動作 (to do something illicit secretly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢喺份文件度做手腳，搞到公司蝕大錢。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 fan6 man4 gin2 dou6 zou6 sau2 goek3, gaau2 dou3 gung1 si1 sit6 daai6 cin2.
examples.translation: Since he had made some changes to the document secretly, the company lost a big sum of money.

senses.definition: 自己曝露一啲關於自己嘅秘密或者新鮮事 (to disclose one's own secrets or news; literally "self explode")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 估唔到佢居然喺全公司嘅人面前自爆自己細個嘅醜事。
examples.jyutping: gu2 m4 dou3 keoi5 geoi1 jin2 hai2 cyun4 gung1 si1 ge3 jan4 min6 cin4 zi6 baau3 zi6 gei2 sai3 go3 ge3 cau2 si6.
examples.translation: To our surprise, he revealed his embarrassing childhood stories to everyone at the company.

senses.definition: 作出自殺式嘅攻擊，同敵人同歸於盡（通常係形容遊戲、流行文化入面嘅情節） (to make a suicidal attack (usually in games or popular culture context))

examples.text: 佢自爆咁多次都死唔去，又幾好嘢喎。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zi6 baau3 gam3 do1 ci3 dou1 sei2 m4 heoi3, jau6 gei2 hou2 je5 wo3.
examples.translation: He made suicidal attacks repeatedly and still managed to survive. I have to say that I am somewhat impressed.

senses.definition: 鬧人用嘅，叫人哋離開用嘅詞語 (to tell people to leave; literally: to fold up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 摺埋啦你，喺度佗手掕腳盞累埋我哋啊。
examples.jyutping: zip3 maai4 laa1 nei5, hai2 dou6 to4 sau2 lang3 goek3 zaan2 leoi6 maai4 ngo5 dei6 aa3.
examples.translation: Go away. You're causing trouble for us, it's better if you weren't here.

senses.definition: 一個杯狀嘅金屬物件，被敲擊嘅時候會發聲 (bell; a metal designed to make loud sounds when struck physically)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: mun4 zung1
examples.translation: doorbell

senses.definition: 現代、尤其是電子製造嘅門鐘 (electric doorbell)

examples.jyutping: soeng2 jap6 lai4 ge3 waa2 cing2 gam6 zung1.
examples.translation: Please press the doorbell if you want to come in.

senses.definition: #時鐘；用嚟睇時間又唔係戴喺手腕度嘅儀器（量詞：個） (clock)

examples.jyutping: naau6 zung1
examples.translation: alarm clock

senses.definition: #鐘頭；#小時；六十分鐘（量詞：個／粒） (hour)

examples.text: 元朗搭車去筲箕灣要一#個鐘 有多。
examples.jyutping: jyun4 long5 daap3 ce1 heoi3 saau1 gei1 waan1 jiu3 jat1 go3 zung1 jau5 do1.
examples.translation: It takes over an hour to travel from Yuen Long to Shau Kei Wan.

senses.definition: #時間、時段 (time)

examples.jyutping: gau3 zung1
examples.translation: time is up; literally: enough hour

senses.definition: #扮 (to pretend; to fake; to feign)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 又話淨係試一啖，做咩詐諦飲成半杯？
examples.jyutping: jau6 waa6 zing6 hai6 si3 jat1 daam6, zou6 me1 zaa3 dai3 jam2 seng4 bun3 bui1?
examples.translation: You said you only wanted to a sip, why did you drink half of it?

senses.definition: 報新聞嘅人 (newscaster; news anchor)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zou6 zyu2 bo3 ngaau5 zi6 jiu3 hou2 zeon2.
examples.translation: News anchors are expected to speak with accurate pronunciation.

senses.definition: 使用武力保護自己 (to defend oneself)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zi6 wai6 nang4 lik6
examples.translation: ability to defend oneself

senses.definition: 電話等等通訊設備成功同對方連線 (to put through; to be connected (as in telecommunication))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: Has the call connected yet?

senses.definition: 用#手指、方向記號等去標示某事物 (to point with a finger; to indicate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: go3 paai2 zi2 zyu6 dung1 min6.
examples.translation: The sign is pointing to the east.

senses.definition: #指使 (to order)

examples.text: 老細指我做呢樣做嗰樣。
examples.jyutping: lou5 sai3 zi2 ngo5 zou6 nei1 joeng6 zou6 go2 joeng6.
examples.translation: My boss ordered me to do this and that.

senses.definition: #指導 (to give direction or guidance)

examples.jyutping: wan2 jan4 zi2 tiu4 lou6 nei5 haang4 laa1.
examples.translation: Find someone to guide you on what to do.

senses.definition: #表示 某意思 (to refer to; to mean that)

examples.jyutping: nei5 zi1 ngo5 zi2 bin1 go3 gaa3 laa1!
examples.translation: You know whom I'm referring to.

senses.definition: 滿足到左邊又滿足唔到右邊；好難令兩邊都滿意 (to be caught between two parties in conflict, to be in a dilemma; literally: it's difficult to be on the left or the right)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 老婆同阿媽嗌緊大交，真係左右做人難，我幫邊便都死。
examples.jyutping: lou5 po4 tung4 aa3 maa1 aai3 gan2 daai6 gaau1, zan1 hai6 zo2 jau6 zou6 jan4 naan4, ngo5 bong1 bin1 bin6 dou1 sei2.
examples.translation: My wife and my mom are arguing; I'm caught in a difficult situation! If I take sides, I'll be in trouble.

senses.definition: 身材#健碩 嘅男人 (well-built man)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個辦公室全部都係女仔，想揾個壯漢幫手換水都冇。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 baan6 gung1 sat1 cyun4 bou6 dou1 hai6 neoi5 zai2, soeng2 wan2 go3 zong3 hon3 bong1 sau2 wun6 seoi2 dou1 mou5.
examples.translation: In this all-female office, there are no well-built men who can help replace water dispenser bottles.

senses.definition: 秘密噉去做一啲嘢 (quietly; secretly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 zing6 gai1 gai1 zau2 gwo3 jap6 nei5 fong2.
examples.translation: He sneaked into your room.

senses.definition: 同朋友見面 ((of friends) to gather and to meet)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 wan2 jat6 ceot1 lai4 zeoi6 haa6 aa1!
examples.translation: Let's catch up sometime!

senses.definition: 陳述 (to narrate; to recount)

examples.jyutping: zeoi6 seot6
examples.translation: to narrate

senses.definition: 同自己揾麻煩；令自己身陷#險境 (to make trouble for oneself; to shoot yourself in the foot; literally: to grab a snake and put it up one's arse)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我一早叫你唔好到時插手㗎啦，咪盞捉蛇入屎忽！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jat1 zou2 giu3 nei5 m4 hou2 dou3 si4 caap3 sau2 gaa3 laa1, mai6 zaan2 zuk1 se4 jap6 si2 fat1!
examples.translation: I told you not to meddle with my affairs; now you are just making troubles for yourself.

senses.definition: 形容金融產品價格大升大跌，出現好多交易嘅情況 (the situation of increasing turnover due to huge price fluctuation of financial product)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺蝕錢時賣晒一個股票投資組合，例如可以形容因抵押品價值低於貸款數目時賣貨情況 (to liquidate a portfolio in stock market when losing)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個市跌咗咁多，再唔斬倉就破產喇。
examples.jyutping: go3 si5 dit3 zo2 gam3 do1, zoi3 m4 zaam2 cong1 zau6 po3 caan2 laa3.
examples.translation: The market is crashing. If you don't sell now, you risk bankruptcy.

senses.definition: 指摘人哋計較細微嘅利益；睇埋 #知微 (calculating; stingy; counting every penny.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你買樓連張牀單都要同人計較，做人唔好咁知微麻利啦。
examples.translation: Why are you complaining about a bedsheet when you're buying the whole house? Don't be so stingy.

senses.definition: 指持續一段時間之後；經過若干時間之後 (on and on; after a period of time)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢去咗外國咁多年，整下整下連中文都唔識講。
examples.translation: He has been abroad for many years, and after such a long time, he can hardly speak Chinese now.

senses.definition: 擴大到塞滿、塞爆 (to fill; to expand)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zaang6 baau3 go3 doi2.
examples.translation: The bag is going to burst.

senses.definition: 灌食，或指狼吞虎嚥 (to fill or to pour food into stomach directly letting no time to chew; to wolf down one's food.)

examples.jyutping: zaang6 baau2 hou2 haang4 laa3, gau3 zung1 hoi1 gung1.
examples.translation: Fill up your stomach, then go. It’s time to work.

senses.definition: 開場白，之後講嘅內容通常比較負面 (introductory filler; usually followed by something negative or adversarial; something like "well...", "look, ...")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 兩位，即係噉，你哋耍花槍，細聲啲呀。
examples.jyutping: loeng5 wai2, zik1 hai6 gam2, nei5 dei6 saa2 faa1 coeng1, sai3 seng1 di1 aa3.
examples.translation: Look, you two lovebirds, if you're going to fool around, do it quietly.

senses.definition: 做咗啲古靈精怪嘅嘢 (to do something odd and wicked)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢係個怪人，成日整鬼整怪。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai6 go3 gwaai3 jan4, sing4 jat6 zing2 gwai2 zing2 gwaai3.
examples.translation: He's an odd person, always doing strange things.

senses.definition:
着#迷你裙 與過膝襪嗰時，#大髀 暴露出來嘅部份；源自日文 (Zettai ryōiki; the area of bare skin in the gap between overknee socks and a miniskirt; literally: absolute territory
jpn:絶対領域（ぜったいりょういき）)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 絕對領域真係引死人喇，誘惑到不得了，難以抗拒啊！
examples.jyutping: zyut6 deoi3 ling5 wik6 zan1 hai6 jan5 sei2 jan4 laa3, jau5 waak6 dou3 bat1 dak1 liu5, naan4 ji5 kong3 keoi5 aa3!
examples.translation: Zettai ryōiki is incredibly tempting, it's irresistible!

senses.definition: 用好長嘅時間先完成；拖延時間 (to finish something in a long time; to delay, to put off)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 唔好響到支支佐佐啦，快啲搞埋收工喇。
examples.translation: Let's quickly wrap this up, it's time to finish work and go off duty.

senses.definition: 傾閒計，講啲冇用嘅嘢；打發時間 (to chatter; to kill time)

examples.text: 呢期返工都無咩做，日日支支坐坐。
examples.translation: Recently not much task to do in office, we just stay there to chatter and kill time.

senses.definition: #文字；記錄#語言 嘅#符號（量詞：隻／個／行） (character; word)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hon3 zi6
examples.translation: Chinese character; Japanese kanji

senses.definition: 十二小時制嘅時鐘上面有十二個代表整點嘅數字，分針每五分鐘就到另一個數字，所以每個字就用嚟代指五分鐘（量詞：個） (five minutes; literally 'number' (referring to the distance between two adjacent numbers on a clock))

examples.jyutping: bun3 go3 zi6
examples.translation: two minutes and a half

senses.definition: 憑據、字據 (written pledge, contract)

examples.translation: to sign and confirm the agreement

senses.definition: 書法；字跡；筆跡；寫字嘅痕跡、表現形式（量詞：手） (script; handwriting; penmanship; calligraphy)

examples.jyutping: nei5 sau2 zi6 hou2 leng3 wo3!
examples.translation: Your handwriting/calligraphy is beautiful!

senses.definition: 硬幣上鑄有幣值數字果一邊 (tails (of a coin))

examples.text: 擲到公我就俾一蚊你，擲到字你就俾一蚊我。
examples.jyutping: zaak6 dou2 gung1 ngo5 zau6 bei2 jat1 man1 nei5, zaak6 dou2 zi6 nei5 zau6 bei2 jat1 man1 ngo5.
examples.translation: If it's heads, I'll give you a dollar; if it's tails, you'll have to give me a dollar.

senses.definition: #發音 (pronunciation (of a word or character))

examples.jyutping: zi6 zing3 hong1 jyun4
examples.translation: to speak with clear articulation

senses.definition: 以前男子滿二十歲，行過冠禮，代表經已成人，就會取表字（或作#別字），改嗰陣會襯返佢本名嘅意思。同輩外人多數唔會直呼其名，而係以字相稱。 ((in Chinese culture) zi, i.e. a courtesy name bestowed upon a man at his coming-of-age ceremony at 20. Although the courtesy name usually matches in meaning with the given name, the former is usually used in place of the latter by acquaintances of the same generation as a term of address.)

examples.jyutping: ngok6 fei1, zi6 paang4 geoi2
examples.translation: Yue Fei, courtesy name Pengju

senses.definition: 揸主意；做決定；做#莊 (to (take the responsibility to) make a decision, to be in charge; literally: to be the banker in a gamble)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今鋪我揸莊，梗係玩盡佢！
examples.translation: This round I'm the banker, surely I will play it hard !

senses.definition: 咒罵一個人從骨子、根本都係#賤（量詞：副） (rotter; useless wretch; literally: cheap bones)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你呢啲賤骨頭，唔鬧你都唔去做嘢！
examples.translation: You really are good for nothing; you won't do anything unless scolded.

senses.definition: 統治者視人民如子女而對佢哋所作嘅稱呼 (subjects (like the ruler's children))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zam6 ge3 zi2 man4 dou1 hou2 joeng5 mou6 zam6.
examples.translation: All my subjects greatly admire me.

senses.definition: 早先、原本 (before, a period of time ago)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: There used to be a house here.

senses.definition: 剛才 (just now)

examples.translation: Someone has been looking for you earlier.

senses.definition: 彙集好多人嘅諗法同智慧，以獲得更廣大嘅效益 (to draw on a collective wisdom and absorb all useful ideas)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋嚟集思廣益一下，諗下我哋個present要做咩topic好。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 lei4 zaap6 si1 gwong2 jik1 jat1 haa5, nam2 haa5 ngo5 dei6 go3 pwi6 sen1 jiu3 zou6 me1 top1 pik4 hou2.
examples.translation: Let's discuss what topic we should choose for our presentation.

senses.definition: 平息紛爭；喺彼此之間有#衝突 嘅人中間做調停。 (Literally "to be the ugly person", figuratively "to play the peacemaker", "to settle a quarrel", "to act as an intermediary and potentially face hostility as a result".)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢兩個#撐 到恆，唯有我做醜人#搞掂 佢啦。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 loeng5 go3 caang3 dou3 hang4, wai4 jau5 ngo5 zou6 cau2 jan2 gaau2 dim6 keoi5 laa1.
examples.translation: They're being so adversarial; I guess I'll have to mediate.

senses.definition: 透過理性反省問題前設嘅思考方法（而非經驗觀察）從而去解釋事物嘅學科；有好多分支，例如#邏輯、形而上學、知識論、倫理學、#美學 之類 (philosophy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 外在世界係其中一個好值得研究嘅哲學問題。
examples.jyutping: ngoi6 zoi6 sai3 gaai3 hai6 kei4 zung1 jat1 go3 hou2 zik6 dak1 jin4 gau3 ge3 zit3 hok6 man6 tai4.
examples.translation: The philosophy of the external world is a highly worthy subject for study.

senses.definition: 關於某個範疇背後嘅做法、技巧、竅門等等（量詞：套） (the skills, methodology, wisdom within a subject)

examples.text: 我想知道丹麥人嘅生活哲學。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 soeng2 zi1 dou3 daan1 mak6 jan4 ge3 sang1 wut6 zit3 hok6.
examples.translation: I want to know the philosophy of life of Danish people.

senses.definition: 利用硬嘅嘢，多次噉用力撞向另一樣嘢，將被撞嗰樣撞碎、撞散 (to pound; to pestle)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zung1 joek6
examples.translation: to pound medicinal herbs in a mortar

senses.definition: 揮拳打 (to hit with a fist)

examples.text: 好想一嘢舂爆佢個死人頭！
examples.jyutping: hou2 soeng2 jat1 je5 zung1 baau3 keoi5 go3 sei2 jan4 tau4!
examples.translation: I really want to smash his head open!

senses.definition: 亂咁行向或者行入一個地方 (to go towards or into somewhere haphazardly)

examples.translation: to walk unsteadily around and bumping into things

senses.definition: #跌 落、跌入 (to fall into)

examples.text: 隻鴨過馬路嗰陣舂咗落坑渠。
examples.jyutping: zek3 aap3 gwo3 maa5 lou6 go2 zan6 zung1 zo2 lok6 haang1 keoi4.
examples.translation: The duck fell into the ditch when crossing the road.

senses.definition: 形容一個人返工唔係為咗維持基本嘅生活需要，而只係為咗要買一啲額外嘅、名貴嘅嘢嚟娛樂自己；返工並唔係必要；多數指女性 (does not need one's salary for living expenses, one's salary is for luxuries and unnecessities (usually of women); literally, to earn money for buying flowers to wear)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢返工都係賺錢買花戴㗎啫，佢邊緊張份工。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 faan1 gung1 dou1 hai6 zaan6 cin2 maai5 faa1 daai3 gaa3 ze1, keoi5 bin1 gan2 zoeng1 fan6 gung1.
examples.translation: She works for luxuries, not out of necessity. I wouldn't expect her to take her job seriously.

senses.definition: 各種人嘅表現同面貌 (diverse appearance of the masses)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 只要細心觀察生活中各種眾生相，必然會有好多有趣嘅發現。
examples.translation: By carefully observing various aspects of daily life, one is sure to discover many interesting things.

senses.definition: 細隻或者年齡細嘅#豬 (little pig (of size or age))
senses.label: 名詞

免費贈送嘅票，通常憑票可以換其他嘢 (complimentary ticket)

examples.translation: Lee Tai Man didn't go to the university. When he knew that Miss Chan was a doctor, he dared not to date her again.
