senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 藍屋建築群嘅中庭有休憩空間，可以俾人喺度hea下。
examples.jyutping: laam4 uk1 gin3 zuk1 kwan4 ge3 zung1 ting4 jau5 jau1 hei3 hung1 gaan1, ho2 ji5 bei2 jan4 hai2 dou6 he3 haa5.
examples.translation: There is a recreation space at the atrium in the Blue House Cluster for people to take a rest.

senses.definition: 一種堅硬嘅建築材料，通常係長方體嘅，用泥或者黏土燒製而成（量詞：嚿） (brick; building block)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢棟舊樓日久失修，已經連鋼筋磚頭都露埋出嚟。
examples.jyutping: ni1 dung6 gau6 lau2 jat6 gau2 sat1 sau1, ji5 ging1 lin4 gong3 gan1 zyun1 tau4 dou1 lou6 maai4 ceot1 lai4.
examples.translation: This old building is so mismanaged that large pieces of concrete peel off and rusty steel bars are exposed.

senses.definition: 比喻房地產物業（量詞：嚿） ((figuratively) real estate; property)

examples.text: 佢用辛辛苦苦儲落嚟嘅七萬蚊，再加埋佢老豆俾佢嘅六百四十五萬，終於買咗佢人生嘅第一嚿磚頭喇！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jung6 san1 san1 fu2 fu2 cou5 lok6 lai4 ge3 cat1 maan6 man1, zoi3 gaa1 maai4 keoi5 lou5 dau6 bei2 keoi5 ge3 luk6 baak3 sei3 sap6 ng5 maan6, zung1 jyu1 maai5 zo2 keoi5 jan4 sang1 ge3 dai6 jat1 gau6 zyun1 tau4 laa3!
examples.translation: With the 70000 dollars that he painstakingly saved, plus the 6.45M dollars given by his father, he finally managed to buy his first apartment.

senses.definition: 一種植物；係#冬瓜 嘅變種，但係細過冬瓜好多；#毛瓜 (hairy gourd; fuzzy melon; fuzzy squash; hairy cucumber)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: san1 sin1 ge3 zit3 gwaa1 jau5 hou2 do1 mou4.
examples.translation: Fresh hairy gourds have lots of hair.

senses.definition: 一個人埋怨自己唔好 (to bemoan one's fate; to be full of remorse and self-reproach)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 美美真係好樂觀，遇到挫折從來唔會自怨自艾。
examples.jyutping: mei5 mei5 zan1 hai6 hou2 lok6 gun1, jyu6 dou2 co3 zit3 cung4 loi4 m4 wui5 zi6 jyun3 zi6 ngaai6.
examples.translation: Mei-mei is an optimistic person, never moaning about her fate when she encounters difficulties.

senses.definition: 得到其他人嘅嘉許，例如贏到比賽或者獎項，令到自己所屬嘅團體都光彩 (to win glory for; to bring honour to)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢喺朗誦比賽入面勇奪冠軍，為校爭光。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 long5 zung6 bei2 coi3 jap6 min6 jung5 dyut6 gun3 gwan1, wai6 haau6 zang1 gwong1.
examples.translation: He won first prize in the speech competition, winning glory for his school.

senses.definition: 物體#體積 變大 (to grow in size; to expand; to swell; bloated)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: sik6 dak1 taai3 do1 je5 go3 tou5 zoeng3 saai3.
examples.translation: I feel bloated because of overeating.

senses.definition: 形容有種就嚟#嘔吐、#反胃 嘅感覺 (to retch; to feel like vomiting)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zok3 au2 zok3 mun6
examples.translation: to feel sick; to feel nauseous or queasy

senses.definition: 揾#代罪羔羊；#殺一儆百 (to scapegoat; to make an example)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今次公司蝕咗咁多錢，老細肯定揾我嚟祭旗。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 gung1 si1 sit6 zo2 gam3 do1 cin2, lou5 sai3 hang2 ding6 wan2 ngo5 lai4 zai3 kei4.
examples.translation: With such financial loss, I wouldn't be surprised that I would be sent away with boxes as an example.

senses.definition: 由支架、#皮革 或者#布#組合 而成，作為#遊牧 民族嘅#住所、#露營 嗰陣瞓覺嘅地方等等（量詞：個） (tent)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 越嚟越多人會帶個帳篷去野餐。
examples.jyutping: jyut6 lai4 jyut6 do1 jan4 wui5 daai3 go3 zoeng3 pung4 heoi3 je5 caan1.
examples.translation: Many more people would bring a tent to picnic.

senses.definition: 對身體、心理、精神上不適嘅統稱 (disease; illness of body or mind)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好多疾病都係由細菌引起嘅。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 zat6 beng6 dou1 hai6 jau4 sai3 kwan2 jan5 hei2 ge3.
examples.translation: Many diseases are caused by germs.

senses.definition: 爭取#冠軍 (to fight for a championship)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今年馬拉松有幾百個參賽者爭冠。
examples.jyutping: gam1 nin2 maa5 laai1 cung4 jau5 gei2 baak3 go3 caam1 coi3 ze2 zang1 gun3.
examples.translation: This year, there are several hundred participants fighting for a championship in the marathon.

senses.definition: 即係話；#代表 (that means)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 佢咁耐冇表示，即是佢唔想結婚住囉。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam3 noi6 mou5 biu2 si6, zik1 si6 keoi5 m4 soeng2 git3 fan1 zyu6 lo1.
examples.translation: He didn't do anything special (to propose to you), that means he doesn't want to get married yet.

senses.definition: 用另一個方法表達 (in other words; let me put it this way)

examples.text: 即是我鍾意，都唔一定要買𠺢嘛。
examples.jyutping: zik1 si6 ngo5 zung1 ji3, dou1 m4 jat1 ding6 jiu3 maai5 gaa1 maa3.
examples.translation: Let me put it this way. Even I do like it, I don't have to buy it.

senses.definition: #加價；價格#上升；變#貴 (to rise in price)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zeoi3 gan6 sek6 jau4 gwai3 zo2.
examples.translation: Recently, there was a rise in oil prices.

senses.definition: 組合加裝嵌 (to fabricate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢買咗啲舊嘅零件返去，諗住自己組裝一部電腦。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 maai5 zo2 di1 gau6 ge3 ling4 gin2 faan1 heoi3, nam2 zyu6 zi6 gei2 zou2 zong1 jat1 bou6 din6 nou5.
examples.translation: He has bought some old components because he would like to fabricate a computer.

senses.definition: 啱啱諗住；準備喺好短嘅時間內去做一件事 (to be just about to)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我啱啱諗住去你辦公室揾你。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 aam1 aam1 nam2 zyu6 heoi3 nei5 baan6 gung1 sat1 wan2 nei5.
examples.translation: I am just about to look for you at your office.

senses.definition: #插嘴；打斷人哋講嘢 (to interrupt somebody during their speech or conversation; literally: to interrupt a song)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你咪暫亂歌柄，畀人哋講埋先啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 mai5 zaam6 lyun6 go1 beng3, bei2 jan4 dei6 gong2 maai4 sin1 laa1.
examples.translation: Don't interrupt him, let him finish first.

senses.definition: 將眾多光線聚集照射著一個特定嘅細範圍 (to focus light)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zeoi6 ziu1 geng3
examples.translation: converging lens

senses.definition: 將注意集中喺某人或者事物上 (to focus (somebody's attention) on sth.)

examples.text: 大會將會聚焦討論煤炭。
examples.jyutping: daai6 wui2 zoeng1 wui5 zeoi6 ziu1 tou2 leon6 mui4 taan3.
examples.translation: The conference will be focused on coal.

senses.definition: 過咗好短嘅時間；亦形容時間過得飛快 (after a short while; also used to describe how time flies)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 zyun2 haa5 ngaan2 zau6 m4 gin3 jan4.
examples.translation: He disappeared after a short while.

senses.definition: 肛管組織發炎或者腫脹（量詞：粒） ((medicine) haemorrhoids; piles)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: saang1 zi6 cong1
examples.translation: to suffer from haemorrhoids

senses.definition: （指#方法）產生到預期中嘅成效 (as effective as expected)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢隻止痛藥一食就奏效。
examples.jyutping: nei1 zek3 zi2 tung3 joek6 jat1 sik6 zau6 zau3 haau6.
examples.translation: This painkiller is very effective. It starts easing pain soon after you take it.

senses.definition: 一種紅色嘅果實（量詞：粒） (jujube; Chinese date)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 舉行中式婚禮要準備紅棗茶。
examples.jyutping: geoi2 hang4 zung1 sik1 fan1 lai5 jiu3 zeon2 bei6 hung4 zou2 caa4.
examples.translation: Jujube tea is a must-have item in Chinese weddings.

senses.definition: 為自己出頭、唔好衰俾人睇、贏得人哋嘅認同同埋肯定 (to work hard and succeed, to strive for people's recognization and affirmation; to fight for your own rights)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 俾人蝦就一定要出聲為自己爭口氣！
examples.jyutping: bei2 jan4 haa1 zau6 jat1 ding6 jiu3 ceot1 seng1 wai6 zi6 gei2 zaang1 hau2 hei3!
examples.translation: You have to speak out and fight for your own rights!

senses.definition: 講惡毒嘅説話，希望唔好嘅事會發生喺嗰個人身上 (to curse)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 小妮好自豪自己好瘦，所以成日俾人咒佢變肥。
examples.jyutping: siu2 nei4 hou2 zi6 hou4 zi6 gei2 hou2 sau3, so2 ji5 sing4 jat6 bei2 jan4 zau3 keoi5 bin3 fei4.
examples.translation: Siu-nei is so proud of being slim that she kept being cursed for getting fat.

senses.definition: 好集中噉望住、視線集中 (to gaze at; to look attentively at)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢一臉崇拜噉注視住台上嘅表演者。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 lim5 sung4 baai3 gam2 zyu3 si6 zyu6 toi4 soeng6 ge3 biu2 jin2 ze2.
examples.translation: She gazed admiringly at the performers on stage.

senses.definition: #展示#顯露 (to expose; to express; to show)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 掙脱鞋帶社會枷鎖，解放腳指展露自我。
examples.jyutping: zang1 tyut3 haai4 daai2 se5 wui2 gaa1 so2, gaai2 fong3 goek3 zi2 zin2 lou6 zi6 ngo5.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]Free your toes and break the societal chains of shoelaces to express yourself.

senses.definition: 主要、全職嘅工作（量詞：份） (main occupation; full-time job)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢除咗正職，重有兩份兼職。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ceoi4 zo2 zing3 zik1, zung6 jau5 loeng5 fan6 gim1 zik1.
examples.translation: Besides her full-time job, she has two part-time jobs.

senses.definition: 形容道路上面有好多車，郁得好慢，甚至完全郁唔到；交通唔暢順 ((of traffic) congested; jammed)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: gaau1 tung1 zai1 sak1
examples.translation: traffic congestion

senses.definition: 承認自己犯咗錯，做返啲嘢嚟請求人原諒 (to apologise for an offence)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 為咗向公司謝罪，我願意辭職。
examples.jyutping: wai6 zo2 hoeng3 gung1 si1 ze6 zeoi6, ngo5 jyun6 ji3 ci4 zik1.
examples.translation: In order to apologise for my offence to the company, I'm willing to resign.

senses.definition: 技巧純練，可以想做到任何想要嘅效果；控制得好 (comfortable with; good at doing something; skillful at)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zoeng2 hung3 zi6 jyu4
examples.translation: to control well

senses.definition: 冇罰錯或者冇罰多，同所犯嘅錯相匹配 (to be well-deserved for one's punishment)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你衝紅燈，俾警察抄牌係罪有應得嘅。
examples.jyutping: nei5 cung1 hung4 dang1, bei2 ging2 caat3 caau1 paai4 hai6 zeoi6 jau5 jing1 dak1 ge3.
examples.translation: You jumped a red light, and was fined by the police, (you)'re well-deserved for your punishment.

senses.definition: 阻止人繼續講，唔老嚟、唔啱聽嘅話；反對人哋講嘅嘢 (used to stop one's speech about something undesirable or unlucky; used to object; literally: close gate)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 甲：「如果我哋唔合格點算？」乙：「閘住！我點會唔合格啫！」
examples.jyutping: gaap3: jyu4 gwo2 ngo5 dei6 m4 hap6 gaak3 dim2 syun3? jyut3: zaap6 zyu6! ngo5 dim2 wui5 m4 hap6 gaak3 zek1!
examples.translation: A: "What can we do if we fail?" B: "Stop it! I won't fail, will I?

senses.definition: #尖 、#鋭利；形容啲嘢個頭好幼細、鋒利，好容易拮到其他嘢嘅 (sharp; fine-edged; acute (of a tool))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: dou1 fung1 zim1 jeoi6
examples.translation: sharp-pointed knife

senses.definition: 針對事件嘅#核心 (directed at the heart of the issue; critical; pointed; incisive; penetrating)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 tai4 ceot1 ge3 man6 tai4 hou2 zim1 jeoi6.
examples.translation: He asked a penetrating question.

senses.definition: 將頭髮紮起，變成一條條唔易散開嘅#辮 (to braid)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 zaat3 bin1 hou2 tai2 di1.
examples.translation: You look better without braids.

senses.definition: 有活力；活潑；好動 (vivacious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 細路哥好精力，個個都扎扎跳。
examples.jyutping: sai3 lou6 go1 hou2 zing1 lik6, go3 go3 dou1 zaat3 zaat3 tiu3.
examples.translation: Children are very energetic and vivacious.

senses.definition: 形容非常之嬲；好多時指有人做錯事，但又唔可以嚴厲懲罰 (to be extremely angry; to be livid with rage; incensed)

examples.text: 咁淺嘅嘢佢都唔識，我真係比佢激到我扎扎跳。
examples.jyutping: gam3 cin2 ge3 je5 keoi5 dou1 m4 sik1, ngo5 zan1 hai6 bei2 keoi5 gik1 dou3 ngo5 zaat3 zaat3 tiu3.
examples.translation: She doesn't know even simple things like these. She's driving me crazy.

senses.definition: 必然發生，冇得改變同控制 (to be destined; to be fated; to be doomed)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ming6 zung1 zyu3 ding6
examples.translation: fated

senses.definition: 人嘅手掌，或者叫#手心 上面皮膚嘅紋理（量詞：條） (lines on one's hands; palm print)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 睇掌紋推測一個人嘅命運
examples.jyutping: tai2 zoeng2 man4 teoi1 caak1 jat1 go3 jan2 ge3 ming6 wan6
examples.translation: to examine one's palm print to predict his/her fate

senses.definition: 就好似；同某樣嘢一樣 (just as; exactly; equally)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 正如你所講，讀書唔係淨係為咗考試合格嘅。
examples.jyutping: zing3 jyu4 nei5 so2 gong2, duk6 syu1 m4 hai6 zing6 hai6 wai6 zo2 haau2 si5 hap6 gaak3 ge3.
examples.translation: Just as you said, studying is not merely for passing the examinations.

senses.definition: 遇到不利或負面嘅事，變成受害者；例如染病、俾人攻擊，等等 (to be adversely affected; to be a victim among a group of people; especially referring to things like being infected by a disease, being attacked or hacked, etc.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我喺佢向住我打乞嗤之後中咗招。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hai2 keoi5 hoeng3 zyu6 ngo5 daa2 hat1 ci1 zi1 hau6 zung3 zo2 ziu1.
examples.translation: I got sick after getting sneezed at.

senses.definition: 打仗嘅地方（量詞：個／片） (battlefield; battleground)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zin3 coeng4 zung1 si1 waang4 pin3 je5
examples.translation: The battlefield is littered with corpses.

senses.definition: 政治局勢；政治情況；政治氣候（量詞：個） (political situation; political scene)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 政局安定先至可以發展經濟。
examples.jyutping: zing3 guk6 on1 ding6 sin1 zi3 ho2 ji5 faat3 zin2 ging1 zai3.
examples.translation: The economy can be developed only when the political situation is stable.

senses.definition: 俾蟲咬咗個#窿 ((of insects) to eat; to bore through)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: bei2 cung4 zyu3
examples.translation: to be moth-eaten

senses.definition: （牙）#爛 ((of teeth) to decay)

examples.text: 小明食得太多糖，啲牙蛀晒。
examples.jyutping: siu2 ming4 sik6 dak1 taai3 do1 tong2, di1 ngaa4 zyu3 saai3.
examples.translation: Siu-ming eats too many sweets so he has tooth decay now.

senses.definition: #電流 通過身體，引致痛楚、受傷、死亡 (to give or get an electric shock)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 小心觸電，唔好掂到啲電纜。
examples.jyutping: siu2 sam1 zuk1 din6, m4 hou2 dim6 dou2 di1 din6 laam6.
examples.translation: Watch yourself. Don't touch the power cables.

senses.definition: 比喻對人心動 (to have a crush on someone)

examples.text: 當我第一眼見到個女仔，我就有種觸電嘅感覺。
examples.jyutping: dong1 ngo5 dai6 jat1 ngaan5 gin3 dou2 go3 neoi5 zai2, ngo5 zau6 jau5 zung2 zuk1 din6 ge3 gam2 gok3.
examples.translation: I started to have a crush on her since I first saw her.

senses.definition: 採取唔食嘢嘅手段，通常係以餓死作為#要脅，去#抗議 或者#控訴 一啲嘢 (to go on a hunger strike; to stop eating in protest)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zyut6 sik6 kong3 ji5
examples.translation: hunger strike

senses.definition: #叻 嘅嘢；擅長嘅範疇（量詞：門） (specialty; forte)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 ge3 zyun1 coeng4 hai6 coeng3 go1.
examples.translation: I'm good at singing.

senses.definition: 轉到另一間學校繼續學業 (to change schools; to transfer to another school)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zyun2 hok6 sang1
examples.translation: student who changes school

phonetic.original: zau2 zeoi3 saam1 fan1 sing2:zau2 zeoi3 saam1 fan1 seng2

senses.definition: 指一個人應承擔自己的所作所為，即使其為酒醉狀態（字面解釋：即使酒醉了，仍應有三分醒） (used to assert that someone who is drunk is still responsible or accountable for their actions; literally: drunk means a thirty percent sober)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 甲對乙講：「我愛你。」旁人：「『酒醉三分醒』呀，佢應該真係鍾意咗你。」
examples.jyutping: gaap3 deoi3 jyut3 gong2: ngo5 oi3 nei5. pong4 jan4: zau2 zeoi3 saam1 fan1 sing2 aa3, keoi5 jing1 goi1 zan1 hai6 zung1 ji3 zo2 nei5.
examples.translation: A told B: "I love you." Bystander: " 'Drunk means a thirty percent sober', he should really fall in love with you.

keywords: zau2 zeoi3 saam1 fan1 sing2:zau2 zeoi3 saam1 fan1 seng2

senses.definition: #差唔多；#即將；#就快；淨返少少進度就完成 (almost; soon)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: caan1 faan6 zau6 sik6 dak1 laa3.
examples.translation: The meal is soon to be ready to eat.

senses.definition: #正正；標示對象嘅描述精準、準確 (precisely; exactly)

examples.text: 呢個人就係佢男朋友喇！
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 jan4 zau6 hai6 keoi5 naam4 pang4 jau5 laa3!
examples.translation: This person is precisely her boyfriend.

senses.definition: 表示堅決嘅語氣或者#對抗 緊某啲嘢 (used to indicate determination, confrontation or antagonism)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 zau6 m4 seon3 ngo5 hok6 m4 sik1.
examples.translation: I just don't believe that I couldn't learn it.

senses.definition: 即刻輪到下一個動作，連續發生；通常同副詞「#一」連用去表達 (used to indicate two actions which happen consecutively, usu. in serial construction with the adverb #一 jat1; right after; immediately after; then)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.jyutping: zau6 gong2 zau6 dou3
examples.translation: to arrive right after one has been mentioned

senses.definition: 用嚟表達對比 (used to show contrast)

examples.text: #講就天下無敵，做就#無能為力
examples.jyutping: gong2 zau6 tin1 haa6 mou4 dik6, zou6 zau6 mou4 nang4 wai4 lik6
examples.translation: incapable of accomplishing what one says; literally: being the greatest in the world when talking, but unable to help when doing

senses.definition: 強調某樣嘢早已經發生，或者表示開頭已經預料到 (used to emphasize something which has happened a long time ago or used to indicate something that is expected in the first place)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 jat1 zou2 zau6 waa6 zo2 nei5 teng1 laa3!
examples.translation: I've told you in the first place.

senses.definition: 用於條件句，表達前句為後句發生嘅充份條件 (used in a conditional sentence in which the antecedent clause is the sufficient condition for the happening of the event stated in the consequent clause)

examples.jyutping: go2 go3 jan2 nei5 zung1 ji3 zau6 dak1 laa3.
examples.translation: If you like that person, then that's fine.

senses.definition: 屈就於難以改變嘅狀況；用嘅時候放喺兩個相同嘅字句中間 (used between two identical elements to express resignation)

examples.text: 話就話冇事，有苦自己知。
examples.jyutping: waa6 zau6 waa6 mou5 si6, jau5 fu2 zi6 gei2 zi1.
examples.translation: He claims to be alright, in fact suffering alone in silence.

senses.definition: 好似一隻#猛獸 咁發惡 (to flash one's fangs and wave one's claws; figuratively, to make threatening gestures)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 隻老虎隔住個圍欄張牙舞爪，好似想食咗我咁。
examples.jyutping: zek3 lou5 fu2 gaak3 zyu6 go3 wai4 laan4 zoeng1 ngaa4 mou5 zaau2, hou2 ci5 soeng2 sik6 zo2 ngo5 gam2.
examples.translation: The tiger was making threatening gestures through the fences as if it wanted to eat me.

senses.definition: 以自身為中心，自己原地#旋轉 (to self-rotate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 地球自轉一周需要24小時。
examples.jyutping: dei6 kau4 zi6 zyun3 jat1 zau1 seoi1 jiu3 ji6 sap6 sei3 siu2 si4.
examples.translation: It takes the Earth 24 hours to rotate once.

senses.definition: 心情 #焦躁 不安；好 #心急 (anxious; worried)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 一講到成績，佢就好着急。
examples.jyutping: jat1 gong2 dou3 sing4 zik1, keoi5 zau6 hou2 zoek6 gap1.
examples.translation: Talking about exam results, he becomes anxious.

senses.definition: 幫助；#舒緩 (to relieve; to aid)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: zan3 zoi1
examples.translation: disaster relief

senses.definition: 商品銷情遲滯、賣唔出，剩低好多存貨 (unsaleable; overstocked)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今年啲月餅滯銷，餅家唯有大平賣。
examples.jyutping: gam1 nin2 di1 jyut6 beng2 zai6 siu1, beng2 gaa1 wai4 jau5 daai6 peng4 maai6.
examples.translation: This year's mooncakes aren't selling too well, and the bakery has no choice but to offer a huge discount.

senses.definition: 聚集埋一齊 (to mass; to concentrate; to assemble)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fei1 faat3 zaap6 git3
examples.translation: to assemble unlawfully; unlawful assembly

senses.definition: 放入液體度擺一段時間 (to soak; to immerse)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: di1 dau2 jiu3 zam3 gwo3 je2 sin1 zyu2.
examples.translation: Leave the beans to soak overnight before cooking.

senses.definition: 長時間置身某一環境，汲取知識、經驗 (to immerse oneself in a particular environment to gain knowledge or experience)

examples.text: 語言呢家嘢係要浸出嚟㗎。
examples.jyutping: jyu5 jin4 ni1 gaa1 je5 hai6 jiu3 zam3 ceot1 lai4 gaa3.
examples.translation: Language is all about immersion.

senses.definition: 自己救自己 (to save oneself)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢知道要戒毒，就要自救，否則冇人幫到佢。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zi1 dou3 jiu3 gaai3 duk6, zau6 jiu3 zi6 gau3, fau2 zak1 mou5 jan4 bong1 dou2 keoi5.
examples.translation: She knows that to quit drugs, she must help herself. Otherwise, nobody could help her.

senses.definition: 火警嘅時候由建築物入面走去一啲安全嘅地方 (to escape from a fire in a building)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 進行火警演習，訓練啲人喺火警嘅時候點逃生 (to conduct a fire drill)

examples.text: 根據法例規定，學校每半年就要走一次火警。
examples.jyutping: gan1 geoi3 faat3 lai6 kwai1 ding6, hok6 haau6 mui5 bun3 nin4 zau6 jiu3 zau2 jat1 ci3 fo2 ging2.
examples.translation: The law mandates that every school must conduct a fire drill every six months.

senses.definition: 數字加埋嘅結果（量詞：個） (total; sum total)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢問我借左幾次錢，前前後後總數係七千蚊。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 man6 ngo5 ze3 zo2 gei2 ci3 cin2, cin4 cin4 hau6 hau6 zung2 sou3 hai6 cat1 cin1 man1.
examples.translation: He borrowed money from me several times, with a sum total of 7000 dollars.

senses.definition: 喺平時主要練習嘅場地作賽；喺自己地頭作賽 ((of sports) to play at home)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 上次我哋作客都炒佢哋三粒，聽日到我哋主場應該會踢得更好！
examples.jyutping: soeng6 ci3 ngo5 dei6 zok3 haak3 dou1 caau2 keoi5 dei6 saam1 nap1, ting1 jat6 dou3 ngo5 dei6 zyu2 coeng4 jing1 goi1 wui5 tek3 dak1 gang3 hou2!
examples.translation: Last time, we won by three-zero against them in the away game. We should have a better performance when we play at home tomorrow!

senses.definition: #番攤 莊家每次開局都會用一隻手由容器入面攞出攤子，放響蓆上，呢個動作就叫抓攤，國語「抓」近粵音「揸」。揸攤亦有#揸fit 之意 (the action when the host of "fan-tan" (a gambling game) to start a game by gripping buttons out from the container to the mat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: playing tricks while holding a "fan-tan

senses.definition: 一個人應該做嘅嘢；基於佢身份或者以前做過嘅事而定，可以出於法理或者道德，但係唔應該以利益嚟判斷 (responsibility; duty)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fu6 zaak3 jam6
examples.translation: to take responsibility

senses.definition: 慶祝傳統節日，同屋企人一齊食飯 (to celebrate important traditional festivals by having dinner with one's family)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今晚中秋，好多人做節，啲酒樓好爆。
examples.jyutping: gam1 maan5 zung1 cau1, hou2 do1 jan4 zou6 zit3, di1 zau2 lau4 hou2 baau3.
examples.translation: It's Mid-Autumn tonight and many families are having dinner together to celebrate the festival. The Chinese restaurants are thus quite fully booked.

senses.definition: 豬腳部分的肉，通常用來燉湯或整煲仔飯 (pork shank)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 擁有某樣嘢或者某個人嘅人 (owner)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: mat6 zyu2
examples.translation: owner of an object

senses.definition: 控制 (to control)

examples.jyutping: zyu2 zoi2
examples.translation: to control; to dominate

senses.definition: 控制一個地方、場合並且以佢為根基嘅人 (host)

examples.jyutping: ban1 zyu2
examples.translation: host and guest

senses.definition: 組織入面權威最高、有其他人服從嘅人 (master)

examples.jyutping: zyu2 buk6
examples.translation: master and servant

senses.definition: 重要過其他 (main; primary)

examples.jyutping: zyu2 jiu3
examples.translation: main

senses.definition: 同自己有關 (subjective)

examples.jyutping: zyu2 gun1
examples.translation: subjective

senses.definition: #主語 ((grammar) subject)

examples.jyutping: zyu2 wai6 git3 kau3
examples.translation: subject-predicate construction

senses.definition: 某啲宗教裏面對#神 嘅稱呼 (God; Lord)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: soeng6 zyu2
examples.translation: Lord

senses.definition: 為咗鼓勵人做一啲嘢，或者追求一啲特質，而去給予回報 (to reward; to encourage)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你做晒功課，我會獎你食雪糕。
examples.jyutping: nei5 zou6 saai3 gung1 fo3, ngo5 wui5 zoeng2 nei5 sik6 syut3 gou1.
examples.translation: If you have finished your homework, I will give you an ice-cream as a reward.

senses.definition: 喺計算嘅時候，用嚟表達包含晒兩個項目之間嘅所有，例如「一至三」包括咗一、二、三，而「由今日至月尾」指嘅係由今日開始計算，直至呢個月最後一日之間嘅每一日（包括最後一日）。 (to; till; until; between)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.jyutping: hai2 jat1 zi3 sap6 gaan2 go3 sou3 zi6.
examples.translation: Pick a number between 1 and 10.

senses.definition: 就嚟信一件事或一個人，但係都仲懷疑佢，#半信半疑 (to slightly trust someone or something, while still being sceptical)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 雖然個經紀講到個樓盤又平又正，陳太都只係將信將疑，未肯買。
examples.jyutping: seoi1 jin4 go3 ging1 gei2 gong2 dou3 go3 lau4 pun2 jau6 peng4 jau6 zeng3, can4 taai2 dou1 zi2 hai6 zoeng1 seon3 zoeng1 ji4, mei6 hang2 maai5.
examples.translation: Although the realtor claimed that flat was gorgeous and a bargain, Mrs Chan remained slightly doubtful and unwilling to buy it.

senses.definition: 一個人嘅能力或者技巧達到某個境界所需要嘅客觀而公認嘅條件 (qualification)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ceoi2 siu1 zi1 gaak3
examples.translation: to disqualify

senses.definition: 做某啲嘢嘅社會地位或道德地位 (requisite social status or moral position to do something)

examples.jyutping: nei5 mou5 zi1 gaak3 tung4 ngo5 gong2 tiu4 gin2!
examples.translation: You're in no position to bargain with me.

senses.definition: （通常係#佛教）用嚟畀神職人員做啲宗教活動同埋修煉嘅建築。（量詞：間） (temple; monastery)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 日本京都有好多好靚嘅寺院建築。
examples.jyutping: jat6 bun2 ging1 dou1 jau5 hou2 do1 hou2 leng3 ge3 zi6 jyun2 gin3 zuk1.
examples.translation: Japan has a huge amount of stunning temples in Kyoto.

senses.definition: 因為失去#平衡 而向前跌低 (to fall (on face))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你企到咁出，因住蹱落海呀！
examples.jyutping: nei5 kei5 dou3 gam3 ceot1, jan1 zyu6 zung1 lok6 hoi2 aa3!
examples.translation: You are almost stepping over the edge and might fall into the sea!

senses.definition: 引申指投入喺唔值得做嘅事度 (to devote into something that isn't worth trying)

examples.text: 阿杰都唔鍾意你，唔好再蹱個頭埋去啦！
examples.jyutping: aa3 git6 dou1 m4 zung1 ji3 nei5, m4 hou2 zoi3 zung1 go3 tau4 maai4 heoi3 laa1!
examples.translation: Jay doesn't like you, so please don't fall for him.

senses.definition: 指條件足夠去導致某種結果 (sufficiently; enough)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 未有足夠證據足以證明佢有罪。
examples.jyutping: mei6 jau5 zuk1 gau3 zing3 geoi3 zuk1 ji5 zing3 ming4 keoi5 jau5 zeoi6.
examples.translation: There wasn't sufficient evidence to convict him.

senses.definition: 可以喺計劃嘅時間起到身 (to be able to wake up on time)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我今朝冇校鬧鐘都知醒啝。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gam1 ci3 mou5 gaau3 naau6 zung1 dou1 zi1 seng2 wo4.
examples.translation: I am surprised that I could wake up without the alarm clock this morning.

senses.definition: #過數 (to pay, especially by transferring money via wire transfer or online banking)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jung6 gwai6 jyun4 gei1 zyun2 sou3 mai6 dak1 lo1.
examples.translation: Just transfer the sum via ATM.

senses.definition: 為解釋某啲事、#辯護、推卸責任而作出嚟嘅#原因、#理由 (excuse; pretext)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: wan5 zik6 hau2
examples.translation: to find an excuse

senses.definition: 即係#種 (to plant; to grow)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: zoi1 zung3
examples.translation: to grow plants

senses.definition: 教育；指導 (to teach; to educate)

examples.jyutping: zoi1 pui4
examples.translation: to train; to educate

senses.definition: #仍然；表示動作或狀態維持不變或者重複發生 (still; to indicate that the action or status is unchanged or is repeating)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢喺呢間公司做咗五六年都冇升過職，仲係一個辦公室助理。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 ni1 gaan1 gung1 si1 zou6 zo2 ng5 luk6 nin4 dou1 mou5 sing1 gwo3 zik1, zung6 hai6 jat1 go3 baan6 gung1 sat1 zo6 lei5.
examples.translation: He has been in the same position for 5 or 6 years. Today, he is still an office assistant.

senses.definition: #仍然；表示尚未到某個情況或時間 (still; to indicate that the time has not come yet, or to indicate something is not yet ready)

examples.text: 距離交卷時間仲有十五分鐘。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 lei4 gaau1 gyun2 si4 gaan3 zung6 jau5 sap6 ng5 fan1 zung1.
examples.translation: There is still fifteen minutes before the exam ends.

senses.definition: 更加；表示程度比較 (even more)

examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 zung6 ciu4 sap1 gwo3 cam4 jat6.
examples.translation: Today is even more humid than yesterday.

senses.definition: 另外；補充項目、數量或範圍 (in addition; and; last but not least)

examples.text: 雞蛋六隻，糖呢就兩茶匙，仲有啲橙皮添。
examples.jyutping: gai1 daan2 luk6 zek3, tong4 ne1 zau6 loeng5 caa4 ci4, zung6 jau5 di1 caang2 pei4 tim1.
examples.translation: Six eggs, two table spoons of sugar, and some orange peel.

senses.definition: #式微 嘅#行業 (sunset industry; declining industry)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 隨住科技進步，會計可能會成為夕陽行業。
examples.jyutping: ceoi4 zyu6 fo1 gei6 zeon3 bou6, wui6 gai3 ho2 nang4 wui5 sing4 wai4 zik6 joeng4 hong4 jip6.
examples.translation: As technology advances, accounting may become a sunset industry.

senses.definition: 講嘢或做嘢乾淨俐落 ((of speech; behaviour) simple and direct; forthright)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢直截了當嘅性格可能會俾人誤會佢冇禮貌。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zik6 zit3 liu5 dong3 ge3 sing3 gaak3 ho2 nang4 wui5 bei2 jan4 ng6 wui6 keoi5 mou5 lai5 maau6.
examples.translation: His forthright manner can be mistaken for rudeness.

senses.definition: #暫時#停止，有可能會恢復 (to suspend; to temporarily stop)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: dik1 si2 zaam6 ting4 zoi3 haak3
examples.translation: (taxi) out of service

senses.definition: 覺得#反胃、想#嘔 (to feel sick; to feel nauseous or queasy)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 好多孕婦喺懷孕初期都會成日作嘔作悶。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 jan6 fu5 hai2 waai4 jan6 co1 kei4 dou1 wui3 sing4 jat6 zok3 au2 zok3 mun6.
examples.translation: Many women feel nauseous during the first few months of pregnancy.

senses.definition: 拋出#骰仔，睇下向上嗰一面嘅點數 (roll a die)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: soeng6 dai3 m4 wui5 zaak6 sik1 zai2.
examples.translation: God does not play dice.

senses.definition: 刊物前面嘅一段文字，通常係簡介作者或者刊物嘅內容，抒發對佢哋嘅感受；亦有請朋友或其他人士為本書寫嘅序（量詞：篇） (foreword; preface)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 bun2 san1 syu1 soeng2 ceng2 keoi5 se2 zeoi6.
examples.translation: I would like to invite him to write a preface for my new book.

senses.definition: 優劣、價值 (quality)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ban2 zat1
examples.translation: quality

senses.definition: 遮蓋#瑕疵 (to cover up flaws)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ze1 haa4 gou1
examples.translation: concealer

senses.definition: #訓練 同#改造 一個喺#紀律 方面唔夠好嘅群體 (To refresh; to reinvigorate (usually some sorts of organization that requires discipline).)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我諗我軍嘅第 332 機動部隊係時候要整治吓。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 nam2 ngo5 gwan1 ge3 dai6 saam1 saam1 ji6 gei1 dung6 bou6 deoi6 hai6 si4 hau6 jiu3 zing2 zi6 haa3.
examples.translation: I think it is time to reinvigorate our army's 332nd Mobile Company.

senses.definition: 身體伸直，淨係用腳板踮住地面嘅靜止姿勢 (to stand up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 老師嚟到嗰時，你要企起身。
examples.jyutping: lou5 si1 lei4 dou3 go2 si4, nei5 jiu3 kei5 hei2 san1
examples.translation: When teachers arrive, you should stand up.

senses.definition: 表示做完一件事或者得知某件事嘅結果之後後悔 (feeling regret after receiving an outcome from a piece of work)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: zou2 zi1 gam1 jat6, ho4 bit1 dong1 co1
examples.translation: if one had known it would come to this, he would not have acted so

senses.definition: 提出問題，懷疑一樣嘢係咪真確 (to doubt; to call in question)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢嘅口供受到警方質疑。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ge3 hau2 gung1 sau6 dou3 ging2 fong1 zat1 ji4
examples.translation: His statement is doubted by the police.

senses.definition: 同人見面時，為咗表示友善而做嘅身體動作或語言（量詞：句／聲／個） (hello; greeting)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daa2 ziu1 fu1
examples.translation: to say hello; to greet

senses.definition: 提供幫助 (to give aid; to provide support)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gei6 seot6 zi1 wun4
examples.translation: technical support

senses.definition: 指軟件可以喺某個地方運行 ((of software) to be compatible; to support)

examples.text: 呢個 app 我部電話唔支援㗎。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 ep1 ngo5 bou6 din6 waa2 m4 zi1 wun4 gaa3.
examples.translation: My phone doesn't support this app.

senses.definition: 冷靜地觀察事物嘅變化 (to calmly wait to see how something develop)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋宜家採取唔到任何措施，唯有靜觀其變。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ji4 gaa1 coi2 ceoi2 m4 dou3 jam6 ho4 cou3 si1, wai4 jau5 zing6 gun1 kei4 bin3
examples.translation: We can't take any measure right now; the only thing we can do is wait and see how it develops.

senses.definition: （形容食物）一開包裝就食得，或者#係噉意 煮吓就食得 ((of food) instant; requiring little to no preparation)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zik1 sik6 min6
examples.translation: instant noodles

senses.definition: 引申為一種講求方便、快捷、唔使用腦嘅生活態度，通常都帶有負面意思 (used figuratively, and often negatively, to describe an attitude towards life characterised by convenience, instant gratification, and a lack of forethought)

examples.text: 而家即食文化大行其道，啲後生仔識咗兩三日就拍拖，跟住拍咗拖兩三個禮拜就散，好似即食麪咁，淥完就食，食完就抌。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 zik1 sik6 man4 faa3 daai6 hang4 kei4 dou6, di1 hau6 saang1 zai2 sik1 zo2 loeng5 saam3 jat6 zau6 paak3 to1, gan1 zyu6 paak3 zo2 to1 loeng5 saam1 go3 lai5 baai3 zau6 saan2, hou2 ci5 zik1 sik6 min6 gam2, luk6 jyun4 zau6 sik6, sik6 jyun4 zau6 dam2.
examples.translation: Instant culture is everywhere these days. Teenagers go on a date after two or three days of acquaintance, and break up two to three weeks into their relationship. It's just like instant noodles: cooked, eaten, and promptly disposed of.

senses.definition: 數學用語，即係#集合，將一堆性質相同嘅嘢放埋一齊（量詞：個） ((mathematics) set)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zaap6 leon6
examples.translation: set theory

senses.definition: 對自己嘅信心 (self-confidence; belief in oneself)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jau5 zi6 seon3
examples.translation: to have self-confidence

examples.text: 呢間公司行啲咁嘅獎金制度，做又三十六，唔做又三十六，邊個會勤力做呀？

加快速度趕上 (to chase after; to catch sby up

senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 接住，王子同公主就開開心心噉生活落去喇。
examples.jyutping: zip3 zyu6, wong4 zi2 tung4 gung1 zyu2 zau6 hoi1 hoi1 sam1 sam1 gam2 sang1 wut6 lok6 heoi3 laa3.
examples.translation: And then, the prince and the princess live together happily ever after.

senses.definition: 啱；無錯誤，同實情相符嘅 (correct; right; proper)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: taai3 dou6 zing3 kok3
examples.translation: with a right attitude

senses.definition: 安定心神、令心境平靜不躁 (to calm the mind)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你靜心休養，唔好諗咁多嘢喇。
examples.jyutping: nei5 zing6 sam1 jau1 joeng5, m4 hou2 nam2 gam3 do1 je5 laa3.
examples.translation: Please take a good rest and don't think too much.

senses.definition: 暫時冇辦法離開，要留喺某個地方 (to be detained; to be held up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 一批越南難民仍然滯留喺新加坡。
examples.jyutping: jat1 pai1 jyut6 naam4 naan6 man4 jing4 jin4 zai6 lau4 hai2 san1 gaa3 bo1.
examples.translation: A number of Vietnamese refugees are still detained in Singapore.

senses.definition: 將啲飯煮熟，亦都引申成準備正餐 (to cook rice; figuratively, to prepare a meal)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: bong1 maa1 mi4 zyu2 faan6
examples.translation: to help mum to prepare the meal

senses.definition: #精準、#確實、冇#誤差，符合標準或者切中目標 (accurate; exact; precise)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zeon2 kok3 mou4 ng6
examples.translation: with unerring accuracy

senses.definition: 只係好匆忙、倉猝咁睇一樣嘢，無時間細心欣賞 (to give a cursory glance; to gain a shallow understanding from a fleeting glance; to look over things hurriedly; literally: to look at flowers while riding on horseback)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 去日本嗰幾日都係走馬看花，冇乜睇到啲特別嘢。
examples.jyutping: heoi3 jat6 bun2 go2 gei2 jat6 dou1 hai6 zau2 maa5 hon3 faa1, mou5 mat1 tai2 dou2 di1 dak6 bit6 je5.
examples.translation: During the few days I was in Japan, I gave a cursory glance at the scenery but didn't notice anything special.

senses.definition: #出色 (brilliant; wonderful; splendid)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zing1 coi2 ge3 biu2 jin2
examples.translation: wonderful performance

senses.definition: 用一樣嘢去收埋令一樣嘢，起到保護或掩飾嘅作用 (to cover; to shield)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jau5 haau6 ze1 goi3 zau3 man4 tung4 hak1 baan1
examples.translation: to effectively cover up wrinkles and dark spots

senses.definition: （#人品 上）合乎社會大眾接受得到嘅#道德 基準嘅 ((In personalities) upright; honest; decent)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 表示喺各項之中最#重要 (mainly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我哋嘅產品主要針對一班青少年。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ge3 caan2 ban2 zyu2 jiu3 zam1 deoi3 jat1 baan1 cing1 siu3 nin4.
examples.translation: Our product aims on teenagers mainly.

senses.definition: 光線照落一樣嘢上面 (to light up; to illuminate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zik6 mat6 seoi1 jiu3 joeng4 gwong1 ziu3 se6
examples.translation: Plants need sunshine.

senses.definition: 增強、推進，令一樣嘢變得更好；通常攞嚟形容抽象嘅嘢。同#改善 唔同，增進係一個中性詞，冇原本狀態唔好嘅意思。 (to enhance, to promote, to improve, to facilitate; unlike #改善 goi2 sin6, 增進 is a neutral term without the implication that the original situation was bad)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zang1 zeon3 jau5 ji4
examples.translation: to facilitate friendship

senses.definition: （昆蟲）用口針拮入人或者其他動物嘅皮膚到 ((of insects) to bite)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 有隻蚊針咗我手臂一啖。
examples.jyutping: jau5 zek3 man1 zam1 zo2 ngo5 sau2 bei3 jat1 daam6.
examples.translation: A mosquito bit me on the arm.

senses.definition: #針對；對一個人#零舍 差 (to pick on somebody)

examples.jyutping: nei5 haa5 haa5 zam1 zyu6 ngo5, syun3 dim2 zek1?
examples.translation: Why the hell are you always picking on me?

senses.definition: 為咗得到一樣嘢或者達到一件事而努力 (to strive for; to fight for)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zang1 ceoi2 gang3 do1 ging1 fei3
examples.translation: to fight for more funding

senses.definition: 籌集#資金；向多個財政來源揾資金返嚟應付運作 ((fin.) to raise capital; to pool money)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: kwan4 zung3 zaap6 zi1
examples.translation: crowdfunding

senses.definition: 即係「醫病」 ；接受治療 (to have a treatment for a disease)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 喺香港醫病好貴㗎，所以要保持健康。
examples.jyutping: hai2 hoeng1 gong2 ji1 beng6 hou2 gwai3 gaa3, so2 ji5 jiu3 bou2 ci4 gin6 hong1.
examples.translation: Treatments for illness are expensive in Hong Kong, so we have to maintain health.

senses.definition: 手工精細嘅擺設 (finery; decorations)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一步一步；順序按照每個步驟 (step by step)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 嗰間報館逐步推行緊會員制。
examples.jyutping: go2 gaan1 bou3 gun2 zuk6 bou6 teoi1 hang4 gan2 wui2 jyun4 zai3.
examples.translation: The newspaper company is implementing its membership system stage by stage.

senses.definition: 轉去另一個電視或電台頻道 (to switch to another TV or radio channel)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: dou1 m4 hou2 tai2 ge2, zyun3 toi4 laa1.
examples.translation: The TV programme is not good. Why not switch to another channel?

senses.definition: 引申指用另一種語言溝通 (figuratively, to switch to another language in communication)

examples.text: 可唔可以轉台講返廣東話？
examples.jyutping: ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 zyun3 toi4 gong2 faan1 gwong2 dung1 waa2?
examples.translation: Can you switch to Cantonese?

senses.definition: 轉用第間電訊公司嘅服務 (to switch from a telecommunications company to another one)

examples.text: 呢個台有同行優惠，我同女朋友一齊轉咗台過去。
examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 toi4 jau5 tung4 hang4 jau1 wai6, ngo5 tung4 neoi5 pang4 jau5 jat1 cai4 zyun3 zo2 toi4 gwo3 heoi3.
examples.translation: Since this telecom operator offers discounts for friends, my girlfriend and I switch our mobile phones to it together.

senses.definition: 專門服務某一個地方或者某一個群體嘅交通工具（量詞：架／部） (specially arranged vehicle to pick up a targeted group of people)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hok6 saang1 kap6 gaau3 zik1 jyun4 zyun1 ce1
examples.translation: vehicles exclusively for students and staff

senses.definition: 大過0嘅#數字 (positive number)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今個月嘅收支平衡係正數定係負數啊？
examples.jyutping: gam1 go3 jyut6 ge3 sau1 zi1 ping4 hang4 hai6 zing3 sou3 ding6 hai6 fu6 sou3 aa3?
examples.translation: Is the revenue and expenditure balance for this month positive or negative?

senses.definition: #正確；#精確；錯誤、誤差輕微甚至唔存在；非常貼近實況或者標準 (accurate; exact)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: miu4 zeon2
examples.translation: to aim (a weapon at a target)

senses.definition: 某個實體本身；指稱返本身，以示強調 (oneself; itself; reflexive pronoun for concrete nouns)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: zi6 gei2 jan4
examples.translation: us friends

senses.definition: 喺前面一句講完之後加上補充 (in addition, moreover, besides)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 聽朝6點？太早喇，起唔到身呀，同埋呀人哋做生意嘅邊會咁早開門吖。
examples.jyutping: ting1 ziu1 luk6 dim2? taai3 zou2 laa3, hei2 m4 dou2 san1 aa3, tung4 maai4 aa3 jan4 dei6 zou6 saang1 ji3 ge3 bin1 wui5 gam3 zou2 hoi1 mun4 aa1.
examples.translation: 6 o'clock in the morning? It's too early! I couldn't get up at that time, and, those shops wouldn't open by that time though.

senses.definition: 指唔依賴外力，靠自己嘅努力重新振作。#更生 指再次獲得生命，比喻振興。 (to rely on one's own effort)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你唔可以一世靠外父支持㗎，你應該自力更生，用自己嘅辦法揾生意。
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 ho2 ji5 jat1 sai3 kaau3 ngoi6 fu2 zi1 ci4 gaa3, nei5 jing1 goi1 zi6 lik6 gang1 sang1, jung6 zi6 gei2 ge3 baan6 faat3 wan2 saang1 ji3.
examples.translation: You can't depend on your father-in-law's support for your entire life. You should be self-reliant and find your own way to find business deals.

senses.definition: 強調程度之高；非常 (really; very)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: sik1 dou2 nei5 zan1 hai6 ngo5 ge3 wing4 hang6
examples.translation: It is really my pleasure to know you.

senses.definition: 距離#而家 並唔算長嘅一段時期 (recently; lately)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: zeoi3 gan6 gei2 jat6
examples.translation: in the last few days

senses.definition: 即係#唯有 (can only; have to)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 而家落雨，噉我哋唯有取消野餐啦。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 lok6 jyu5, gam2 ngo5 dei6 wai4 jau5 ceoi2 siu1 je5 caan1 laa1.
examples.translation: Since it is raining now, we have to cancel our picnic.

senses.definition: 唔係扮出嚟或者想隱瞞啲咩，而係發自內心、真誠嘅 (sincerely; genuinely)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: zan1 sam1 zan1 ji3
examples.translation: with all one's heart

senses.definition: 動作／活動仲進行緊 (in process of; in course of; happening or being done now)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 zeon3 hang4 gan2 haau2 si5
examples.translation: Examination is in progress.

senses.definition: #弊傢伙；死喇 (the situation is bad; Oh no)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 死喇，我漏咗條鎖匙喺屋企添......
examples.jyutping: sei2 laa3, ngo5 lau6 zo2 tiu4 so2 si4 hai2 uk1 kei2 tim1.
examples.translation: Oh no, I left my keys at home...

senses.definition: #唯有；表示必要條件，通常同表示結果嘅「#先」或者「#先至」連用，成為條件句 (used to mean the necessary condition, correlatively with #先 or #先至; only (if); just)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 只得少數人知道嘅真相。
examples.jyutping: zi2 dak1 siu2 sou3 jan4 zi1 dou3 ge3 zan1 soeng3
examples.translation: Only a few people know the truth.

senses.definition: 可以支配自己嘅行為，為自己嘅行為負責，憑自己嘅意志行動，唔受外在勢力嘅限制 (free; unrestrained)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zi6 jau4 zi6 zoi6
examples.translation: free

senses.definition: 郁動下個身體 (to walk around)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你啱啱先出院，唔好周圍走動呀，留喺屋企休息下啦！
examples.jyutping: nei5 ngaam1 ngaam1 sin1 ceot1 jyun2, m4 hou2 zau1 wai4 zau2 dung6 aa3, lau4 hai2 uk1 kei2 jau1 sik1 haa5 laa1!
examples.translation: You've just been discharged from hospital, so don't walk around. Stay home and take some rest!

senses.definition: 即係#櫈 （量詞：張） (seat; chair)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 飛機起飛同降落嘅時候都唔可以將座椅椅背校低。
examples.jyutping: fei1 gei1 hei2 fei1 tung4 gong3 lok6 ge3 si4 hau6 dou1 m4 ho2 ji5 zoeng1 zo6 ji2 ji2 bui3 gaau3 dai1.
examples.translation: We should put our seatback upright when the plane is taking off and landing.

senses.definition: 放任容忍；對錯誤嘅行為唔加以制止、約束，由佢發展 (to condone; to indulge; to connive)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我阿姨太縱容佢個仔喇！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 aa3 ji1 taai3 zung3 jung4 keoi5 go3 zai2 laa3!
examples.translation: My aunt indulges her son dreadfully.

senses.definition: 彌補落後咗嘅距離 (to catch up with)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zeoi1 soeng5 ciu4 lau4
examples.translation: to get trendy

senses.definition: 隱藏缺點 (to conceal one's defect)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢唱歌唱到五音不全噉，唯有以笑遮醜。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 coeng3 go1 coeng3 dou3 ng5 jam1 bat1 cyun4 gam2, wai4 jau5 ji5 siu3 ze1 cau2.
examples.translation: His singing is bad because he is tone deaf, so he can only smile to conceal his defect.

senses.definition: 唔係落好耐嘅雨（量詞：陣／場） (a brief rainfall (of any intensity); a shower; a sudden downpour)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zaau6 jyu5 gwo3 hau6 zau6 hai6 tin1 cing4.
examples.translation: After a little rain comes the sun.

senses.definition: 標示事件發生嘅時間同地點；同 #喺 (to indicate the time and location of an action, see also #喺 (hai2))
senses.label: 介詞

examples.jyutping: zoi6 ci2 zi1 cin4
examples.translation: before this

senses.definition: #視乎 (to depend on; to rest with)

examples.jyutping: si6 zoi6 jan4 wai4
examples.translation: One's effort is the decisive factor.

senses.definition: 因為年老而聽力衰退 (to be occasionally deaf because of old age)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我撞撞哋聾，講嘢都大聲咗，以為人哋會聽唔清我講乜。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zong6 zong6 dei2 lung2, gong2 je5 dou1 daai6 seng1 zo2, ji5 wai4 jan4 dei6 wui5 teng1 m4 cing1 ngo5 gong2 mat1.
examples.translation: I've been speaking more loudly since I started having hearing problems, because I thought others didn't understand what I was saying.

senses.definition: 一般嘅稱呼 (a common name)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 黑社會係三合會嘅其中一個俗稱。
examples.jyutping: hak1 se5 wui2 hai6 saam1 hap6 wui2 ge3 kei4 zung1 yat1 go3 zuk6 cing1.
examples.translation: The black society" is one of the common names of the triad society.

senses.definition: 一般咁稱呼 (to be commonly called)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hoi2 lok6 jing1 zuk6 cing1 baak6 fan2.
examples.translation: Heroin is commonly called "white powder".

senses.definition: 完整噉包括咗各種唔同而有關聯嘅事物 (comprehensive; mixed)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: zung3 hap6 fo1 hok6
examples.translation: Integrated Science

senses.definition: 喺#醫學、#藥劑 學、#營養 學同毒理學入面，#物質、#輻射 等嘅數量 (dose)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 開藥劑量唔錯得，分分鐘會死人。
examples.jyutping: hoi1 joek6 zai1 loeng6 m4 co3 dak1, fan1 fan1 zung1 wui5 sei2 jan4.
examples.translation: One cannot prescribe a wrong dose of medication, for it can be deadly.

senses.definition: 指聲調分類入面嘅 #仄聲，係傳統#四聲 入面#上聲、#去聲、#入聲 嘅統稱，指有起伏嘅聲調，同#平聲 相對 (the oblique tone in traditional Chinese phonology)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 一般對聯第一句要#仄 收尾㗎！
examples.jyutping: jat1 bun1 deoi3 lyun2 dai6 jat1 geoi3 jiu3 zak1 sau1 mei5 gaa3!
examples.translation: Usually the last syllable of a couplet has to be in the oblique category!

senses.definition: #戰役（量詞：場） (battle; war)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daa2 sing3 zoeng3
examples.translation: to win a battle

senses.definition: 注意力#專注、集中喺一樣嘢，冇受到外界干擾或者無關嘅諗法影響而轉移 (attentive; observant; concentrated; single-minded; to fix one's attention on)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zyun1 sam1 di1 wan1 syu1 laa1!
examples.translation: Study more attentively!

senses.definition: 利用某個事件或題目去講一啲自己想講嘅嘢，通常係偏離原本嘅題目，主要講述自己嘅不滿 (to seize on an incident or discussion topic to express one's own views, usually in some kind of off-topic rant; literally "to borrow a topic to display (something else)")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿松一聽到人提起考試就借題發揮，喺度大講自己上次考第一嘅事。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 jat1 teng1 dou2 jan4 tai4 hei2 haau2 si5 zau6 ze3 tai4 faat3 fai1, hai2 dou6 daai6 gong2 zi6 gei2 soeng6 ci3 haau2 dai6 jat1 ge3 si6.
examples.translation: Upon hearing someone mention exam, A-chung seized the opportunity, and started to talk about how he aced the last exam.

senses.definition: 盡可能快啲開始或者完成一件事 (immediately; as soon as possible)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: ceng2 nei5 zeon6 faai3 daap3 fuk1 ngo5.
examples.translation: Please reply at your earliest convenience.

senses.definition: 扮#聽 唔到；完全#唔理 (to turn a deaf ear to; to ignore)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我苦心勸阿松，但係佢就置若罔聞。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 fu2 sam1 hyun3 aa3 cung4, daan6 hai6 keoi5 zau6 zi3 joek6 mong5 man4.
examples.translation: I gave A-chung my advice with good intention, but he turned a deaf ear on it.

senses.definition: #容納；喺裏面放一啲嘢 (to carry; to contain; to hold)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 hap2 zong1 me1 gaa3?
examples.translation: What's in this box?/What's this box supposed to hold?

senses.definition: 唔使透過任何中介或者媒介去做嘅 (direct; straightforward)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zik6 zip3 fong1 faat3
examples.translation: direct method

senses.definition: 合乎邏輯以至事實 (true; real; genuine)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zan1 ngan4 zi2
examples.translation: real note

senses.definition: 形容人好#真誠，唔扮嘢 (sincere; honest; earnest; wholehearted)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan6 jan4 hou2 zan1.
examples.translation: He is a sincere person.

senses.definition: #帶 或者運載一個人去一個地方，跟住由嗰個地方運載返去原本個地方 (to pick up somebody and accompany them to a certain place, then return to the original location)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zyun1 ce1 zip3 sung3
examples.translation: to be picked up by private transfer

senses.definition: #種子；#植物 嘅繁殖體 (seed of plants)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: bo3 zung2
examples.translation: to sow

senses.definition: 生物分類嘅單位，一群生物形態相近並且能夠交配繁殖出具生殖能力嘅後代為同一種 (species)

examples.jyutping: jan4 zung3
examples.translation: homo sapiens

senses.definition: 有共同起源或者特質嘅人 (ethnicity; race)

examples.jyutping: wong4 zung2 jan4
examples.translation: the yellow race

senses.definition: 某個地區、團體嘅人#自己#管治 自己 (to exercise autonomy; to govern oneself)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zi6 zi6 keoi1
examples.translation: autonomous region

senses.definition: #好 嘅；#進步 嘅；#有利 嘅 (positive)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zing3 min6 ge3 gaa3 zik6 gun1
examples.translation: positive values

senses.definition: 條狀嘅#紙（量詞：張） (paper slip)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #樹枝 同#樹葉 (branches and leaves)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢盆盆栽嘅枝葉太多，要修剪一下。
examples.jyutping: ni1 pun4 pun4 zoi1 ge3 zi1 jip6 taai3 do1, jiu3 sau1 zin2 jat1 haa6.
examples.translation: This pot/plant has too many branches and leaves, it has to be pruned.

senses.definition: #人生 嘅中段，一般指三十至五十歲左右 (middle-aged)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 gung1 jik1 gam1 hai6 jat1 go3 zi3 jyun6 tyun4 tai2.
examples.translation: The Community Chest of Hong Kong is a voluntary association.

senses.definition: 心入面希望將來可以做到嘅嘢；#理想、#志向、#願望 (desire in one's heart to one day be able to do something; dream; aspiration; wish)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我細個嗰陣嘅志願係做巴士司機。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 sai3 go3 go2 zan2 ge3 zi3 jyun6 hai6 zou6 baa1 si2 si1 gei1.
examples.translation: My dream was to become a bus driver when I was little.

senses.definition: 喺鑊／煲入面加入大量嘅水，喺水度放蒸架，再放裝好咗食物嘅碟／蒸籠，令到食物處於水位之上。利用熱力將水煲滾，再利用水蒸氣將食物煮熟。喺蒸嘅過程唔需要用到油，煮出嚟嘅嘢味道比較清淡，所以好講求食物本身嘅鮮味。 ((of cooking methods) to steam)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你幾點鐘返？我睇吓幾點開始蒸定條魚。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gei2 dim2 zung1 faan1? ngo5 tai2 haa5 gei2 dim2 hoi1 ci2 zing1 ding6 tiu4 jyu2.
examples.translation: When will you come back? I need to decide when to start steaming the fish.

senses.definition: 軟弱、冇用 (weak; useless; trashy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 咁渣斗㗎，少少辣都受唔到。
examples.jyutping: gam3 zaa2 dau2 gaa3, siu2 siu2 laat6 dou1 sau6 m4 dou2
examples.translation: You're so weak, you can't even take a little bit of spice.

senses.definition: 泛指用嚟裝#酒 嘅#杯；無論係啤酒杯、紅酒杯，定係用嚟飲清酒嘅陶瓷杯都可以叫酒杯（量詞：隻） (cup used for alcoholic drinks; eg. wine glass)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 飲唔同嘅酒要用唔同嘅酒杯。
examples.jyutping: jam2 m4 tung4 ge3 zau2 jiu3 jung6 m4 tung4 ge3 zau2 bui1.
examples.translation: Different glasses should be used for different wines.

senses.definition: 唔值得做 (not worth it)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢份工好危險㗎，揾命搏嘅嘢，幾多錢都制唔過。
examples.jyutping: ni1 fan6 gung1 hou2 ngai4 him2 gaa3, wan2 ming6 bok3 ge3 je5, gei2 do1 cin2 dou1 zai3 m4 gwo3.
examples.translation: The job is too dangerous to do. Anything that risks your life, no matter how high the salary, it still doesn't worth it.

senses.definition: 喺造衫、剪布之前要係紙上面畫咗先嘅樣板 (tailor pattern paper)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿媽以前會畫紙樣買布幫我整校服㗎，平過喺出面買多多聲。
examples.jyutping: aa3 maa1 ji5 cin4 wui5 waak6 zi2 joeng2 maai5 bou3 bong1 ngo5 zing2 haau6 fuk6 gaa3, peng4 gwo3 hai2 ceot1 min6 maai5 do1 do1 seng1.
examples.translation: My mom used to draw her own tailor patterns and buy cloth to make my school uniform. It was so much cheaper than buying it from the tailor's.

senses.definition: 雀仔食嘅穀物 (grains for birds)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢種雀唔食雀粟㗎，要食蟲架！
examples.jyutping: ni1 zung2 zoek2 m4 sik6 zoek3 suk1 gaa3, jiu3 sik6 cung4 gaa3!
examples.translation: This kind of bird doesn't eat grain, it eats bugs!

senses.definition: 同#弓 配合，由弓所射出嚟，用嚟遠距離攻擊嘅武器（量詞：枝） (arrow)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zin3 ngai6
examples.translation: archery

senses.definition: #射箭 嘅技藝 (archery)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zin3 ngai6 fan3 lin6 baan1
examples.translation: archery training classes

senses.definition: 用竹嘅幹部做嘅長柱（量詞：條／枝） (bamboo pole)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 見#詐諦 (to pretend; see #詐諦)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 見#詐諦 (to pretend; see #詐諦)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 用力噉用手指將目標拉向掌心，撳實唔放 (to hold; to grasp)

examples.jyutping: zuk1 zyu6! m4 hou2 fong3 aa3!

senses.definition: 唔放走目標，限制佢嘅行動自由 (to catch; to capture)

examples.translation: to catch

senses.definition: 發現、揭發負面嘅或者當事人唔想俾人知嘅嘢 (to spot something negative or to catch somebody doing something (usually which they do not want seen))

examples.jyutping: zuk1 gaan1
examples.translation: to catch adulterers in the act

senses.definition: 要求陪伴或者在場 (to demand someone's accompany or presence)

examples.jyutping: zuk1 hok6 saang1 king1 gai2

senses.definition: 玩棋類遊戲；#捉棋 (to play chess)

examples.jyutping: zuk1 fei1 hang4 kei2
examples.translation: to play aeroplane chess

senses.definition: 一細紥散修修嘅嘢 (a small bundle of; a pinch)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.translation: a small bundle of hair

senses.definition: 捉實 (to hold; to grasp)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: to author

senses.definition: 控制；主導 (to take charge of; to direct)

examples.translation: to be in office

senses.definition: 做；行動 (to perform; to carry out)

examples.translation: to execute

senses.definition: 堅持自己嘅諗法 (to persist; to stick to one's views)

examples.translation: to refuse to realise one's error

senses.definition: 原地將身體變成原本嘅反方向 (to turn one's body; to turn oneself around)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 jat1 zyun3 san1, keoi5 zau6 zau2 zo2 laa3.
examples.translation: Just when I turned around, she was gone.

senses.definition: 旁邊；左邊或者右邊 (next to; beside)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: siu2 ming4 co5 hai2 siu2 ling4 zak1 bin1.
examples.translation: Ming sits next to Ling.

senses.definition: 將一個角切走 (to cut away a corner)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zaap6 jyun4 gok3
examples.translation: to cut a rounded corner

senses.definition: 指一條邊同另一條邊交接形成嘅內角，類似#角落頭；或指兩個平面物件擺放時有其中一條邊掂住，中間形成一個角 (the internal corner between two sides or two walls; or 2 flat objects placed with one side attached, forming a corner between them)

examples.text: 呢個櫃放響鍘角位得喇。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 gwai6 fong3 hoeng2 zaap6 gok3 wai2 dak1 laa1.
examples.translation: This cupboard can be place in the corner space between 2 walls.

senses.definition: 引伸指行捷徑 (figuratively, to take a short cut)

examples.text: 你響前面轉入後巷行啦，鍘角咁行快好多㗎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 hoeng2 cin4 min6 zyun3 jap6 hau6 hong6 hang4 laa1, zaap6 gok3 gam2 hang4 faai3 hou2 do1 gaa3.
examples.translation: You can turn into the lane ahead, it is a short cut that you can save a lot walking.

senses.definition: 一開始、最開頭嘅時候 (initially; at the beginning)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 最初我連一句廣東話都唔識講㗎。
examples.jyutping: zeoi3 co1 ngo5 lin4 jat1 geoi3 gwong2 dung1 waa2 dou1 m4 sik1 gong2 gaa3.
examples.translation: At the beginning, I didn't even know how to speak a Cantonese sentence.

senses.definition: 憑浮誇、張揚嘅舉止博人留意 (swaggering; acting ostentatiously)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: X

senses.definition: 搽喺手指甲或腳趾甲上面嘅化妝品，有唔同顏色，用作修飾、美化或保護#指甲（量詞：樽／罐） (nail polish; nail enamel; nail varnish)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我今日搽呢隻指甲油好唔好呀？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gam1 jat6 caa4 ni1 zek3 zi2 gaap3 jau4 hou2 m4 hou2 aa3?
examples.translation: Should I use this nail polish today?

senses.definition: 利用化學或者物理方法，除去雜質 (to make a substance pure by removing other substances from it)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zing1 zai3 jim4
examples.translation: refined salt

senses.definition: 一種球形嘅硬糖，會插住喺一支白色膠棒上面，有唔同口味 (lollipops, especially Chupa Chups)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 啲小朋友好鍾意食珍寶珠，一吮就可以吮成個鐘。
examples.jyutping: di1 siu2 pang4 jau5 hou2 zung1 ji3 sik6 zan1 bou2 zyu1, jat1 syun2 zau6 ho2 ji5 syun2 seng4 go3 zung1.

senses.definition: 形容供給身體所需嘅養份，或者對陽氣或陰氣嘅補充好充足 (nourishing; nutritious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: dung1 tin1 sik6 se4 hou2 zi1 bou2 gaa3.
examples.translation: It's nourishing to have snakes in the winter.

senses.definition: 連續大量噉收睇一套劇集 (to binge(-watch) a drama series)

examples.jyutping: soeng5 NETFLIX zeoi1 kek6
examples.translation: to binge-watch on Netflix

senses.definition: 表示次序嘅數字（量詞：個） (ordinal number)

examples.text: 我哋將「#第」放喺數字前面嚟到組成序數。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 zoeng1 "dai6" fong3 hai2 sou3 zi6 cin4 min6 lai4 dou3 zou2 sing4 zeoi6 sou3.
examples.translation: We use #第 (dai6) before numbers to form ordinal numbers.

senses.definition: 跑一小段，形成前進衝刺嘅助力，令動作更加順暢 (run-up; approach)

examples.jyutping: tiu3 jyun5 seoi1 jiu3 zo6 paau2.

senses.definition: 繼續#借用；延長借用期限 (to renew; to extend the loan period)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zuk6 ze3 coeng4 dei6
examples.translation: to renew the reservation of a venue

senses.definition: 改變、更換 (to switch; to change)

examples.jyutping: hou2 zyun2
examples.translation: to improve; to change better

senses.definition: 人嘅頭頂上面，啲頭髮喺度螺旋形咁生又生得比較疏嘅位置（量詞：個） (a hair cowlick on top of the head)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 一轉人，二轉鬼，三轉馬騮仔。
examples.jyutping: jat1 zyun3 jan4, ji6 zyun3 gwai2, saam1 zyun3 maa5 lau1 zai2.
examples.translation: An ordinary child has 1 cowlick; a smart child has 2; a naughty child has 3.

senses.definition: 為咗表達對長輩或者偉人嘅#尊敬 之情，而使用嘅#名稱、頭銜或職位；又或指尊敬噉稱呼呢一個動作。（量詞：個） (to honour or extol someone through the use of honorific; respectful address; honourable title)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 「耶穌」係佢肉身時嘅名，而「基督」就係佢嘅尊稱。
examples.jyutping: je4 sou1 hai6 keoi5 juk6 san1 si4 ge3 meng2, ji4 gei1 duk1 zau6 hai6 keoi5 ge3 zyun1 cing1.
examples.translation: Jesus" is the name of his body , while "Christ" is his title.

senses.definition: 身體受到損害；通常係唔小心或者係意外造成 (to hurt; to injure; usually accidentally or carelessly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 zing2 can1 zek3 sau2
examples.translation: He injured his hand.

senses.definition: 自我宣傳；#吹噓 自己有幾叻、有幾好 (to blow one's own trumpet; to toot one's own horn; to brag)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿翰成日自吹自擂自己幾受歡迎，但係事實上個個都唔鍾意佢。
examples.jyutping: aa3 hon6 sing4 jat6 zi6 ceoi1 zi6 leoi4 zi6 gei2 gei2 sau6 fun1 jing4, daan6 hai6 si6 sat6 soeng6 go3 go3 dou1 m4 zung1 ji3 keoi5.
examples.translation: Ah-hon always brags about being so popular; however, no one actually likes him .

senses.definition: 言語上嘅糾紛（量詞：次） (argument)

examples.text: 有咩爭拗都好，去到差館先講。
examples.jyutping: jau5 me1 zang1 aau3 dou1 hou2, heoi3 dou3 caai1 gun2 sin1 gong2
examples.translation: No matter what arguments you have, first go and explain them at the police station.

senses.definition: #仔 同 #女 嘅統稱（量詞：啲／班） (son(s) and daughter(s); children)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 baan1 zai2 neoi2 dou1 gei2 teng1 waa6.
examples.translation: My children are quite obedient.

senses.definition: 加插喺#詞幹 中間嘅#詞綴（量詞：個） (infix)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 古時東亞被送去其他國家做#人質 嘅王子，以交換條件或者達致政治平衡（量詞：名） (a prince sent to be held as a hostage in a neighbouring state in ancient East Asia, in order to exchange prerequisites or to strike a political balance)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 開始#燃燒；#起火 (to catch fire; to be on fire)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cyu4 fong2 ge3 bou3 lim2 zoek6 zo2 fo2.
examples.translation: The kitchen curtain is on fire.

senses.definition: 生物學上#酵母、#黴菌、#菇 類嘅總稱 (fungus)

senses.definition: 同#較量 有關；見 #爭 (zaang1 動詞) (related to competition or fight; see also the verb #爭 zaang1)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: ging3 zang1

senses.definition: #辯論；#拗 (to argue; to dispute)

examples.jyutping: zang1 leon6

senses.definition: 增加；變大 (to grow)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: nin4 zoeng2
examples.translation: old; elder

senses.definition: 事情發生嘅時間比原定、一般前 (early)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 而家仲好早啫，你唔使急。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 zung6 hou2 zou2 ze1, nei5 m4 sai2 gap1.

senses.definition: 日出後至中午之前 (morning)

examples.jyutping: jau4 zou2 dou3 maan5, keoi5 dou1 mei6 ting4 gwo3 sau2.

examples.jyutping: joeng5 zoek3 zai2

examples.jyutping: tiu4 gaai1 hou2 zing6 aa3

senses.definition: #阻擋；令一啲嘢唔能夠順利通過或者發展 (to hinder; to block)

examples.jyutping: zo2 ngoi6 faat3 zin2

senses.definition: #通脹 發生同時，失業率高，經濟低增長甚至倒退 (stagflation)

senses.definition: #豬#面 肉食材，實際上唔係指豬嘅#頸 部 (pig jowl; literally: pig neck)

examples.jyutping: guk6 hoeng1 maau4 zyu1 geng2 juk6

senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 陳先生今朝逝世，終年六十歲。
examples.jyutping: can4 sin1 saang1 gam1 ziu1 sai6 sai3, zung1 nin4 luk6 sap6 seoi3.
examples.translation: Mr. Chan passed away this morning, aged 60.

senses.definition: 整整一年；由年頭到年尾 (throughout the year; year-round)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: zung1 nin4 zik1 syut3
examples.translation: permanently covered with snow

senses.definition: 即係#字體 (typeface; font)

examples.text: 個字款唔夠靚，揀過第二隻啦！
examples.jyutping: go3 zi6 fun2 m4 gau3 leng3, gaan2 gwo3 dai6 ji6 zek3 laa1!
examples.translation: The typeface doesn't look good, change it!

senses.definition: 用啲大把、闊身嘅#刀，大大力咁由上而下分割一啲嘢；而唔係前後拉扯（#切） (to chop; to forcefully cleave with a wide-bodied blade as opposed to back and forth slicing)

senses.definition: 買#叉燒、#燒肉 等熟肉 (to buy Chinese style roast pork or other meats)

senses.definition: 足球術語，指#斬波 ((in football/soccer) to cross; to make a crossing pass or kick)

examples.jyutping: daai6 goek3 zaam2 heoi3 gan6 cyu5
examples.translation: a crossing kick to the nearest goal post

senses.definition: 威脅或破壞人類生存環境嘅事態（量詞：場） (disaster; catastrophe)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 火山爆發會為該區帶嚟大災難，但同時亦都會將佢變為一塊肥沃嘅土地。
examples.jyutping: fo2 saan1 baau3 faat3 wui2 wai4 goi1 keoi1 daai3 lai4 daai6 zoi1 naan4, daan6 tung4 si4 jik6 dou1 wui2 zoeng3 keoi5 bin3 wai4 jat1 faai3 fei4 juk1 ge3 tou2 dei6.
examples.translation: A volcanic eruption causes a catastrophe in the (affected) region, but at the same time, make it a fertile, arable land.

senses.definition: 喺一件事、一個活動嘅最後階段作出嘅#歸納 (a summary or conclusion)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zou6 go3 zung2 git3
examples.translation: to reach a conclusion

senses.definition: 喺一件事、一個活動嘅最後階段作出#歸納 (to sum up; to summarise)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我會總結今日開會討論得出嘅結果。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 wui2 zung2 git3 gam1 jat6 hoi1 wui2 tou2 leon6 dak1 ceot1 ge3 git3 gwo2.
examples.translation: I will summarise the outcomes that we have discussed during today's meeting.

senses.definition: 整出嚟嘅嘢，特別係文化、藝術嘅嘢，有時亦都會指食物；#作品 (cultural or artistic production; occasionally refers to food)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zai3 zok3 gung1 si1
examples.translation: a production company (specialising in film, photography, etc.)

senses.definition: #政治#制度 (political system)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zing3 zai3 goi2 gaak3
examples.translation: political system reform

senses.definition: #香蕉（量詞：隻／條／樖／梳） (banana)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daai6 ziu1
examples.translation: plantain

senses.definition: 規定統一制式、式樣嘅服裝（量詞：套／件） (uniform)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hok6 haau6 zai3 fuk6
examples.translation: school uniform

senses.definition: 用強力壓制、征服 (to subdue)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 警方成功制伏綁匪，人質安然無恙。

senses.definition: 喺男性監獄入面，由於男性嘅性欲無從發泄，迫於無奈會揾其他男人解決需要；於是有流傳，喺監獄嘅公共浴室沖涼果陣，如果跌咗番梘，勢必要#烏低 身去執，有意無意間抬起咗屁股；有性需要嘅男人就會乘虛而入，將佢哋嘅陽具插入執番梘果個人嘅肛門，發泄性慾 (to leave oneself vulnerable to sodomy; refers to a phenomemon in male prisons where prisoners, due to an inability to satisfy sexual urges, turn to fellow prisoners for gratification; it is said that dropping the soap while in the showers and bending down to pick it up presents an opportunity for another prisoner to forcibly sodomize them; literally: to pick up the soap)

examples.jyutping: aa3 faan4 dak6 bit6 zung1 oi3 hoeng1 gong2 ge3 je6 ging2.
examples.translation: Ah-fan loves the night view of Hong Kong very much.

senses.definition: 因為自己做錯嘢而羞愧同內疚嘅感覺 (sense of guilt; guilty feeling)

examples.jyutping: seng4 gin6 si6 hai6 ji3 ngoi6, nei5 jing1 goi1 fong3 dai1 nei5 ge3 zeoi6 gau3 gam2.
examples.translation: It's an accident. You should stop feeling guilty.

senses.definition: #紮馬 係練#功夫 嘅基本姿勢；比喻已經準備好要#打交 (to prepare to fight)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 次次傾嘢都傾到紮晒馬咁，冷靜啲啦你哋！
examples.jyutping: ci3 ci3 king1 je5 dou1 king1 dou3 zaat3 saai3 maa5 gam2, laang5 zing6 di1 laa1 nei5 dei6!
examples.translation: You guys seem to have prepared to start a fight whenever you have a talk. Calm down!

senses.definition: 將一啲長形、條狀嘅物件整斷。 (to break; to snap)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 枝筆咁硬，你都可以折斷嘅？
examples.jyutping: zi1 bat1 gam2 ngaang6, nei5 dou1 ho2 ji5 zit3 tyun5 ge2
examples.translation: The pencil is tough. How can you break it off?

senses.definition: 形容成日塞住嘅地方（量詞：個） (a bottleneck)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 隧道入口好似一個樽頸，所以時時塞車。
examples.jyutping: seoi6 dou6 jap6 hau2 hou2 ci5 jat1 go3 zeon1 geng2, so2 ji5 si4 si4 sak1 ce1.
examples.translation: The entrance of the tunnel is like a bottleneck, therefore there are always traffic jams.

senses.definition: 形容一個難以突破嘅關卡，通常指一個人技藝去到一定水平，好多功夫先換得少少進步 (plateau (in one's skills))

examples.text: 我覺得我琴技已經去到樽頸位，再練落去都無咩意思。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gok3 dak1 ngo5 kam4 gei6 ji5 ging1 heoi3 dou3 zeon1 geng2 wai2, zoi3 lin6 lok6 heoi3 dou1 mou5 me1 ji3 si1.
examples.translation: I think my piano skills have plateaued, there's no point in continuing to practice.

senses.definition: #粉刺 (acne)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: Don't pinch acne.

senses.definition: 釀造日本#清酒 嘅原料 (rice specially for brewing sake)
#張開 口；#擘 大口 (to open mouth)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: only to open one's mouth to be fed; a metaphor describing someone who has an easy life with everything provided

senses.definition: 暫停職務之後再正常上任，有時解#連任；有人響任期內離任，接任嘅人做埋剩低嘅任期 (to serve the second term, may involve a pause during two term; to take up someone's role when one leave the role within the term.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢今屆已經係第三次當選，將會再續任主席一職。
examples.translation: He is now the third time elected, will continue the role as the chairman.

senses.definition: 榛屬植物嘅堅果，果殼係啡色，果肉係白色（量詞：粒） (hazelnut)

examples.translation: He betrayed a gang leader as a result he was pursued by assassins.

senses.definition: 表示一樣嘢嘅關鍵、重點 (to rest with; to be determined by; to depend on)

examples.jyutping: sing4 gung1 zoi6 jyu1 nei5 fu6 ceot1 gei2 do1 nou5 lik6.

examples.translation: to follow traditional rites

examples.translation: I did that guy a favour and gave him some money for the fare. I didn't expect that he was deceiving others.

senses.definition: 為咗知道真相，追隨住線索一路查落去 (to investigate; to trace)

senses.definition: 國家名；位於#非洲 中南部內陸，首都係盧薩卡；好大部份嘅人口都係基督宗教嘅信徒 (Zambia)

senses.definition: 盛行於北美地區既美式中國菜，食材不定，乜都有：如豬肉、雞絲、綠豆芽、芹菜絲、筍絲、青椒絲、洋葱絲、大白菜絲 (an American style Chinese dish)

senses.definition: 加好多米落鑊去煮。意思係加重份量令件事更#大鑊，即係指做一啲嘢令某人麻煩更大、或對某人#落井下石，如陷害、對付、告發一個人，或講人壞話、誣告、堆砌證供等 (Literally: add a lot rice to cook in a wok - then there will be a big wok (big trouble). means doing something to add trouble to someone, to salt the wound, to kick some when he is down, like to setup, to pick on, to snitch on someone, to bad-mouth on someone, to make a false accusation or made-up evidence, etc.)

senses.definition: 除咗#淡菜 之外，只係食植物，而且唔食五葷（大蒜、小蒜、興渠、慈葱、茖葱）。同食#素 嘅分別係，食齋通常有宗教目的，例如為咗積福、還願、免殺戳。（量詞：碟） (vegetarian food, especially when eaten for religious purposes)

senses.definition: 頂住一樣嘢等佢唔好倒塌或者跌落嚟 (to prop up; to sustain; to support)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: tiu4 cyu5 zi1 caang1 hei2 seng4 go3 uk1 deng2.
examples.translation: This column supports the whole roof.

senses.definition: 古時中國嘅一種#私刑，主要針對#通姦 男女，將犯人放入用竹造嘅豬籠，然後丟入河。輕則俾犯人頭部露出水面，浸若干時間；重則浸死 (a lynching where adulterers are forced into a cage for pigs and thrown into water)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: #直率；#坦白 (straight forward)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你講嘢咁直白好容易傷害到人㗎！
examples.jyutping: nei5 gong2 je5 gam3 zik6 baak6 hou2 jung4 ji6 soeng1 hoi6 dou3 jan4 gaa3!
examples.translation: Your straight forward way of speaking easily hurts people.

senses.definition: 喺特定地點同時間發生嘅 #戰鬥，係#戰爭 嘅一部份（量詞：場） (battle; campaign of war)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 coeng4 kyut3 sing3 fu6 ge3 zin3 jik6
examples.translation: a battle which determines victory and defeat

senses.definition: 爭奪鬥爭 (to fight against somebody and sometimes even try to obtain something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢哋幾兄弟爭鬥父親留下嘅遺產。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 gei2 hing1 dai6 zang1 dau3 fu6 can1 lau4 haa6 ge3 wai4 caan2.
examples.translation: He and his brothers are fighting against each other and trying to obtain one more share of his father's legacy.

senses.definition: 畀自己用 (Use for a personal purpose; for personal use; to be for oneself; to make sth. for one's own use)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hap6 kuk1 kei4 sung3 lai5 ding6 zi6 jung6 aa3?
examples.translation: Is the cookie a gift or for your personal use?

senses.definition: 精神飽滿、心情舒暢 (in a good mood; energetic)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 做完晨運，成個人都精神爽利。
examples.jyutping: zou6 jyun4 san4 wan6, seng4 go3 jan4 dou1 zing1 san4 song2 lei6.
examples.translation: After morning exercise, I feel delighted and energetic.

senses.definition: 快捷、迅速到達嘅次要路徑；引申為能夠迅速解決問題嘅辦法、途徑（量詞：條） (shortcut (literally or metaphorically))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zau2 zit6 ging3
examples.translation: to take a shortcut

senses.definition: 刻意整傷、摧殘自己 (to self-harm)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢十零歲嗰陣成日𠝹手自殘。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 sap6 leng4 seoi3 go2 zan2 sing4 jat6 gaai3 sau2 zi6 caan4.
examples.translation: She often cut her wrist to harm herself at teenage.

senses.definition: （速度）快、方便 ((of speed) fast)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: faai3 zit3
examples.translation: fast and agile

senses.definition: （行動）快；靈活 ((of actions) agile)

examples.jyutping: man5 zit3
examples.translation: agile

senses.definition: 行事聰敏又合乎規範 (smart and obedient; tending to act in clever ways that conform with the social norm)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個細路咁精乖，有前途！
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 sai3 lou6 gam3 zeng1 gwaai1, jau5 cin4 tou4!
examples.translation: This little kid is so smart and obedient. He will have a bright future!

senses.definition: 指導引領 (to guide; to lead)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zi2 jan5 fong1 hoeng3
examples.translation: to direct one's course

senses.definition: 記錄個案 (on record)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gei3 luk6 zoi6 on3
examples.translation: to put on record

senses.definition: 喺旁邊（比較正式） ((formal) beside; next to)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 家長應該在旁指引子女。
examples.jyutping: gaa1 zoeng2 jing1 goi1 zoi6 pong4 zi2 jan5 zi2 neoi5.
examples.translation: Parents should accompany and guide their children.

senses.definition: 傳統民間宗教習俗：#白虎 被視為帶嚟禍凶嘅神獸；喺#驚蟄 當日，或者#破台 嘅時候，用肥豬肉拜祭白虎，象徵將肥豬肉塞喺佢口中，等佢冇得張口作惡 (to worship the white tiger and offer pork with fat, for the sake either of peace of a year following #驚蟄 ging1 zik6, or of a place in which no thanksgiving opera performance took place before)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 動物消化系統嘅一部分，#大腸 嘅最後一段，喺#肛門 對上，作用係儲存糞便（量詞：條） (rectum)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 中國古代會叫直腸做廣腸。
examples.jyutping: zung1 gwok3 gu2 doi6 wui5 giu3 zik6 coeng2 zou6 gwong2 coeng2.
examples.translation: In ancient China, the rectum was called "wide gut".

senses.definition: 用嚟連接兩樣嘢嘅裝置 (connector; joint)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 自己覺得好興奮、高漲或者陶醉，就算其他人唔覺都好 (to become enthusiastic or elated on one's own, regardless of other people)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢搞完個gag喺度自high緊，你由佢啦。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gaau2 jyun4 go3 gek1 hai2 dou6 zi6 haai1 gan2, nei5 jau2 keoi5 laa1.
examples.translation: He told a joke and just started giggling uncontrollably on his own. Just let him.

senses.definition: 好管閒事、鐘意講是非八卦嘅人 (a gossip, a nosy person)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個諸事理講晒你啲秘密畀人知啦。
examples.translation: That blabbermouth already told your secret to everyone.

senses.definition: 一種工具；放入未變硬嘅石屎，將入面嘅氣泡震出嚟 (concrete vibrator)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #政治#評論 (political commentary)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zing3 leon6 zit3 muk6
examples.translation: political commentary programme

senses.definition: 城市名；位於#中國#廣東，#中山 以南，緊接#澳門 (Chu Hoi; Zhuhai)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 指貴族嘅名份或者地位（量詞：個） (peerage; nobility)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zoek3 wai6 ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 gai3 sing4 gaa3?
examples.translation: Can nobility be inherited?

senses.definition: 心理學術語；指運用外界刺激以建立特定反應或者行為模式嘅過程，分為古典制約同操作制約 (conditioning)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋可以利用制約養成習慣。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ho2 ji5 lei6 jung6 zai3 joek3 joeng5 sing4 zaap6 gwaan3.
examples.translation: We can build habits by conditioning.

senses.definition: 限制約束 (to restrict)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gung1 kyun4 lik6 jing1 goi1 sau6 dou3 zai3 joek3.
examples.translation: Public power should be restricted.

senses.definition: 追住一個人嚟到斬佢 (to chase after a person and attack him with a knife)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 一名男子喺旺角遭到戴口罩嘅刀手追斬。
examples.jyutping: jat1 ming4 naam4 zi2 hai2 wong6 gok3 zou1 dou3 daai3 hau2 zaau3 ge3 dou1 sau2 zeoi1 zaam2.
examples.translation: A man was chased after and attacked by a masked hitman in Mong Kok.

senses.definition: #馬桶；俾人坐響度屙屎嘅地方 (toilet bowl; chamber pot; literally: sitting toilet)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #擔#遮 嗰陣，俾人拎住把遮嘅部份 (umbrella handle)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 長者生活津貼嘅簡稱，用意係每個月為年滿65歲、有經濟需要嘅長者補助生活開支 (old age living allowance (OALA))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 政府計劃改革長生津，合併普通同高額兩種津貼。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 gai3 waak6 goi2 gaak3 zoeng2 sang1 zeon1, hap6 ping3 pou2 tung1 tung4 gou1 ngaak2 loeng5 zung2 zeon1 tip3.
examples.translation: The government plans to reform the old age living allowance by combing Normal and Higher OALA.

senses.definition: 即#出租；指即付出金錢以換取使用一個地方或者物件 (to rent; to lease)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zou1 ze3 dei6
examples.translation: leased territory

senses.definition: 冇公司合約束縛嘅人，通常形容運動員、演員 (free agent)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢位球員同球會解約，恢復自由身。
examples.jyutping: ni1 wai6 kau4 jyun4 tung4 kau4 wui5 gaai2 joek3, fui1 fuk6 zi6 jau4 san1.

senses.definition: 同伴侶分手，恢復單身 (to break up and become single again)

examples.text: 佢同男朋友分手，回復自由身。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 tung4 naam4 pang4 jau5 fan1 sau2, wui4 fuk6 zi6 jau4 san1.

senses.definition: #租借#居住 (to rent a property for living)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zou1 zyu6 si1 jan4 lau4 jyu5
examples.translation: to rent a private accommodation

senses.definition: #扮 自己無份參與或者唔知道一件事，逃避嗰件事所帶嚟嘅責任同後果；扮懵 (to act stupid; to play the fool; to get away by pretending ignorance)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你咪喺度詐傻扮懵，我知道你有做！
examples.jyutping: nei5 mai5 hai2 dou6 zaa3 so4 baan6 mung2, ngo5 zi1 dou6 nei5 jau5 zou6!
examples.translation: Don't play the fool. I know you did it!

senses.definition: 向君王提出建議或者勸告 (to advise or to urge a monarch or an emperor)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: faan6 ngaan4 zeon3 gaan3
examples.translation: to advise the monarch even it may be offensive

senses.definition: 即係 #正午；日間嘅十二點鐘（量詞：個） (noon; midday)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋通常喺中午十二點食飯。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 tung1 soeng4 hai2 zung1 ng5 sap6 ji6 dim2 sik6 faan6.
examples.translation: We often have lunch at 12:00 noon.

senses.definition: 喺澳門，即係#中午飯 嘅簡寫 (lunch (in Macau))
一種#粒子；同#中子 加埋組成#原子核，帶有正電荷，#質量 同中子差唔多，重過#電子 好多（量詞：粒） (proton)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 淨係得一種#顏色 (monochromatic)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.translation: coloured t-shirt

senses.definition: #指出 並且#證明 (to testify; to give evidence)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 受害人出庭指證疑犯非禮。
examples.jyutping: sau6 hoi6 jan4 ceot1 ting4 zi2 zing3 ji4 faan2 fei1 lai5.
examples.translation: The victim incriminated the suspect of indecent assault in court.

senses.definition: 地理位置 (location; site)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: dei6 zi2
examples.translation: address

senses.definition: #控制 ；#安排 (to control; to dominate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: sau6 jan4 zi1 pui3
examples.translation: to be controlled by others

senses.definition: 重覆學同練嘅過程 (to repeatedly learn and practise)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: hok6 zaap6
examples.translation: to learn

senses.definition: 熟悉；熟知 (to familiarise)

examples.jyutping: zaap6 gwaan3
examples.translation: habits

senses.definition: #商人、#地主、有錢人嘅統稱 (capitalist)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 資本家自古以嚟都中意剝削工人。
examples.jyutping: zi1 bun2 gaa1 zi6 gu2 ji5 lai4 dou1 zung1 ji3 mok1 soek3 gung1 jan4.
examples.translation: Captialists tend to exploit workers since ancient times.

senses.definition: 財務上完全獨立，自己負擔盈利或虧蝕，而唔依賴其他外來嘅援助 (responsibility for one's own profits and losses)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢間公司自從私有化之後，就要自負盈虧，炒咗好多冗員。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 gung1 si1 zi6 cung4 si1 jau5 faa3 zi1 hau6, zau6 jiu3 zi6 fu6 jing4 kwai1, caau2 zo2 hou2 do1 jung2 jyun4.
examples.translation: This company has been trimming a lot of fat after the privatization that brings itself to bear its own cost.

senses.definition: 自己負責返，無其他人幫手#孭飛 (to be responsible for one's own action)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hau6 gwo2 zi6 fu6
examples.translation: to take sole responsibility for the consequences

senses.definition: 收入同教育水平較高嘅階層，通常可以負擔到自己買車、買樓，有工開，冇#上流 社會 咁有錢，但又冇#基層 咁窮。 (middle class)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zung1 caan2 gaai1 kap1
examples.translation: the middle class

senses.definition: 唔俾對方留低，要佢離開一個地方 (to kick someone out; to drive out (followed by the place from which the person was removed))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zuk6 ceot1 wui2 coeng4
examples.translation: to eject sby from the meeting hall

senses.definition: 大髀側跟微微開衩嘅運動短褲（量詞：條） (sport shorts with open seams; literally: truth pants)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 敍述完，冇#之後、#然後 嘞；完結嘅時候 (at last; finally)
