examples.text: 最後我哋都返到屋企喇！
examples.jyutping: zeoi3 hau6 ngo5 dei6 dou1 faan1 dou3 uk1 kei2 laa3!
examples.translation: At last we're home!

senses.definition: 正常、合理嘅情況下；通常用嚟突顯一啲問題或者奇怪嘅地方 (under normal circumstance; normally)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 ziu3 lei5 jing1 goi1 bei2 nei5 fong3 gaa3 gaak3?
examples.translation: Normally he should be granting you leave, right?

senses.definition: 懲罰；約束 (to punish; to constraint)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 做#媒人 (to be a matchmaker)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 同主持者合謀但假扮唔認識主持者，以欺騙第三者 (to work with an organiser secretly and pretend not to know the organiser, so as to deceive others)
支撐一個團體嘅人 ((usually of a group and describing a person) mainstay; cornerstone)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿修係足球隊嘅中流砥柱。
examples.jyutping: aa3 sau1 hai6 zuk1 kau4 deoi2 ge3 zung1 lau4 dai2 cyu5.
examples.translation: Ah-sau is the mainstay of the football team.

senses.definition: 唔受拘束，隨心所欲，安詳悠閒 (leisurely and carefree)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢追求一種自由自在嘅生活。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zeoi1 kau4 jat1 zung2 zi6 jau4 zi6 zoi6 ge3 sang1 wut6.
examples.translation: He pursues a leisurely and carefree life.

senses.definition: 即係#就係；表示前者係後者嘅上佳例子 (usually #就係 zau6 hai6; is exactly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 zau6 hai6 oi3 laak3.
examples.translation: This is love.

senses.definition: 後面接「#也」；表示轉折；即係 #就算 (followed by #也, to show a logical turn, also #就算 zau6 syun3)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 我就算冇錢都唔會求佢。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zau6 syun3 mou5 cin2 dou1 m4 wui5 kau4 keoi5.
examples.translation: I wouldn't ask for his help even if I became penniless.

senses.definition: 只不過；淨係 (only)

examples.text: 呢個細路真係唔錯，係內向咗啲啫。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 sai3 lou6 zan1 hai6 m4 co3, hai6 noi6 hoeng3 zo2 di1 ze1.
examples.translation: This kid is quite nice, just a bit introvert.

senses.definition: 財困要慳住使，滅少開支 (to cut down on one's spending; to tighten one's belt; to have no money for food; literally, to tie a pack of fire crackers)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 勒緊褲頭，減少肚餓感覺 (to tighten one's belt to reduce the hunger)
指潑灑液體，或水濺起。 (to spatter of liquid; water splashing)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: 落少量酒/水去隻熱鑊度
examples.translation: to sprinkle little amount of wine/water on a hot pan

senses.definition: 淬火 (to quench (red-hot metal))

examples.translation: to quench the knife

senses.definition: 引申為將一樣熱野好快變冷 (to cool down something quickly)

examples.translation: cool down the wok quickly with water

senses.definition: 用嚟#屠宰 #豬肉 嘅 #枱 (butcher table, literally pork table)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 好多人一齊用但係冇間開嘅#辦公室 長#枱 (long office desk that is share by many people but not subdivided)

examples.text: 自從寫字樓轉咗用豬肉枱之後，大家都覺得冇晒私人空間，好唔慣。
examples.translation: After replacing the office desks with the long desks, we all feel the lack of personal space and cannot get used to it.

senses.definition: 借咗人錢唔還；過期唔畀錢 (to avoid paying a debt; literally: to run debt)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 盤生意賺好少錢，一畀人走數就執得。
examples.jyutping: pun4 saang1 ji3 zaan6 hou2 siu2 cin2, jat1 bei2 jan4 zau2 sou3 zau6 zap1 dak1.
examples.translation: With a low profit margin, the business will close easily if counter parties do not pay the debt.

senses.definition: 違背承諾 (to break a promise)

examples.text: 記得請我食飯唔好走數呀！
examples.jyutping: gei3 dak1 ceng2 ngo5 sik6 faan6 m4 hou2 zau2 sou3 aa3!
examples.translation: You owe me a meal. Keep your word!

senses.definition: 點啲液體、醬或者粉末 (to dip in liquid, sauce or powder)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 高級酒店最高規格、最豪華嘅#套房（量詞：間） (presidental suite; royal suite)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 由下而上，通常係向皇帝送禮 (to pay tribute, esp. to emperors)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zeon3 gung3 ban2
examples.translation: things that are used to pay tribute

senses.definition: 將某個部位嘅健康皮膚，移植到過深或者面積過大嘅傷口，以減少治療所需程序，同埋改善身體嘅外表及功能；通常愛嚟治療外傷、燒傷、感染或者某啲手術嘅傷口 (skin grafting)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 延續期限 (to extend the period of something; to renew)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢本書到期喇，我仲未睇完，所以今日要去圖書館續期。
examples.jyutping: ni1 bun2 syu1 dou3 kei4 laa3, ngo5 zung6 mei6 tai2 jyun4, so2 ji5 gam1 jat6 jiu3 heoi3 tou4 syu1 gun2 zuk6 kei4.
examples.translation: This book is due, but I haven't finished it yet. So I'm going to the library to renew it today.

senses.definition: 擊打某人 (to beat someone up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: daa2 keoi5 jat1 caan1

senses.definition: 自己為自己感到開心 (to be pleased with oneself; to be complacent)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿強贏咗第一個回合，不禁沾沾自喜。
examples.jyutping: aa3 koeng4 jeng4 zo2 dai6 jat1 go3 wui4 hap6, bat1 gam3 zim1 zim1 zi6 hei2.
examples.translation: Ah-keung won the first round and can't help feeling complacent.

senses.definition: 度過晚年，直至老死 (to spend one's last years)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jyu5 lou5 bun6 zung1 lou5
examples.translation: to spend one's last years with one's spouse

senses.definition: 因為想某個女仔成為自己女朋友，而做嘅一系列行動 (to (romantically) chase after a girl)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA

senses.definition: 的士用語，墨魚被捕捉果陣會噴出墨汁，比喻抽查汽車排氣，噴出過量黑煙嘅車會被檢控。而排氣檢查站就叫#墨魚站 ((taxi driver jargon) to check the exhaust emissions of a vehicle. Literally: to catch cuttlefish)

senses.definition: 每年農曆十二月廿四嘅傳統節日；「灶」即係#灶君，係掌管廚房同埋飲食嘅神。灶君亦負責監察人間善惡，而且會喺年底向#玉帝 禀報，所以世人就有謝灶嘅習俗，希望灶君向玉帝美言幾句。 (A traditional festival on the 24th day of the last month of the Chinese year; 謝灶 literally means "to thank the Kitchen God (#灶君)". At the end of the Chinese year, the Kitchen God reports activities of every household to the Jade Emperor (#玉帝), so people thank him in advance for reporting their activities in a positive light, so that they would not get punished by the emperor.)

senses.definition: 用燈籠、彩帶等飾物去裝飾一個喜慶場合 (to decorate a festive occasion with ornament, such as lanterns, ribbons, etc.)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 中秋節個陣好多地方都張燈結綵，好喜慶、好熱鬧。
examples.translation: So festive is the Mid-Autumn Festival, as many places are decorated with lanterns.

senses.definition: 揮動手臂，通常用喺打招呼、問候嘅時候 (to beckon; to wave)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 向你招手嗰個係邊個啊？
examples.jyutping: hoeng3 nei5 ziu1 sau2 go2 go3 hai6 bin1 go3 aa3?
examples.translation: Who is the guy that waved at you?

senses.definition: #軍事 上嘅#策略；喺同人#競爭 時用嚟達成各種目標、解決各種問題嘅#策略；通常都係#全面 而且#長遠 嘅（量詞：個） (strategy; tactics)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: soeng1 jip6 zin3 loek6
examples.translation: business strategics

senses.definition: 慢慢#前進、#發展 (to advance gradually; to proceed in an orderly and gradual way)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ceon4 zeoi6 zim6 zeon3
examples.translation: to follow in order and advance step by step

senses.definition: 喺#茶樓 食嘅#早餐（量詞：餐） (breakfast  in a Chinese restaurant, usu. with tea and dim sum; morning tea)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 爺爺每朝做完晨運就去飲早茶。
examples.jyutping: je4 je2 mui5 ziu1 zou6 jyun4 san4 wan6 zau6 heoi3 jam2 zou2 caa4.
examples.translation: Grandpa goes for breakfast in a Chinese restaurant every morning after taking some exercise.

senses.definition: 好精神，奮發進取嘅氣概（量詞：股） (youthful spirit; vigour)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jau5 ziu1 hei3
examples.translation: to be full of vigour

senses.definition: 為咗某個目的而蒐集同埋網羅 (to recruit; to solicit; to canvass)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ziu1 laam2 jan4 coi4
examples.translation: to recruit talents

senses.definition: 經常犯案嘅犯人（量詞：個／名） (habitual offender)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 將食物加熱煮熟嘅廚房設備，通常係燒#煤氣、#石油氣，而以前燒#煤 或者#火水 嘅明火爐具，但亦都有用#電 嘅 (kitchen stove)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: （情況、狀況）越來越好，慢慢#進步 ((of conditions, situations) getting better and better; gradually becoming more enjoyable)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 下半年嘅生意漸入佳境。
examples.jyutping: haa6 bun3 nin4 ge3 saang1 ji3 zim6 jap6 gaai1 ging2.
examples.translation: The business gradually got better in the second half of the year.

senses.definition: 保持自己嘅尊嚴，唔容許其他人歧視、輕蔑或者侵犯嘅心理 ((sense of) self-respect; pride)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 對於男人嚟講，自尊心係一樣比起生命更加重要嘅嘢。
examples.jyutping: deoi3 jyu1 naam4 jan2 lai4 gong2, zi6 zyun1 sam1 hai6 jat1 joeng6 bei2 hei2 saang1 ming6 gang3 gaa1 zung6 jiu3 ge3 je5.
examples.translation: To men, the sense of self-respect is far more important than one's life.

senses.definition: 控制、約束自己 (to restrain oneself; to control oneself)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zi6 zai3 nang4 lik6
examples.translation: the ability to control oneself

senses.definition: 即係#點樣 (how; what)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.text: 如果你唔同我交代清楚個程序，我又點知應該點做呢？
examples.translation: If you are not going to tell me in detail about the procedures, how am I supposed to know how to do it?

senses.definition: 舉辦活動嘅主辦方；通常係私人活動 (host)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #過門都係客 吖，我突然發現我有啲失職，都未盡主人家嘅禮儀熱烈歡迎大家添。
examples.translation: I should have been more hospitable to all of you, I just found out I haven't welcomed all of you as a not-so-good host yet.

senses.definition: 去領導一班人、或者去做一件事嘅主要負責人；去做#話事人 (to be in charge, to be the leader; literally, to hold the big flag)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 go3 po1 zek4 keoi5 zaa1 daai6 kei4.
examples.translation: He is in charge of the project this time.

senses.definition: 阻擋、遮藏、見唔到 (to cover; to hide from view)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: taai3 joeng4 bei2 wu1 wan4 ze1 bai3 zo2.
examples.translation: The sun is blocked by the black clouds.

senses.definition: 一種好薄、冇毛粒嘅布質被（量詞：張） (thin blanket)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #得到 (to occupy)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fei1 faat3 zim3 geoi3 taa1 jan4 coi4 caan2
examples.translation: to illegally occupy one's property

senses.definition: 獨立而確定嘅諗法或者主張 (idea or thought of one's own; one's own judgment; definite view)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢咁冇主見，唔會係一個好嘅領袖！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam3 mou5 zyu2 gin3, m4 wui5 hai6 jat1 go3 hou2 ge3 ling5 zau6!
examples.translation: He never has an opinion of his own, I don't think he'll make a good leader.

senses.definition: 遵守同埋服從某啲指令 (to follow someone's instruction or will; to comply with; to obey)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 士兵要遵從軍官嘅命令。
examples.jyutping: si6 bing1 jiu3 zeon1 cung4 gwan1 gun1 ge3 ming6 ling6.
examples.translation: Soldiers need to obey the officers' orders.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
喺一個場合拎某件或者多件物品出嚟俾其他人睇 (to exhibit; to put on display)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢件文物係第一次喺國外展出嘅。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gin6 man4 mat6 hai6 dai6 jat1 ci3 hai2 gwok3 ngoi6 zin2 ceot1 ge3.
examples.translation: The cultural relic is displayed overseas for the first time.

senses.definition: 錄音、電視、電影錄影帶，經過編輯，令聲音畫面配合得好好嘅過程 ((of films) to cut and edit; to perform film-editing)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢套電影係由導演親自剪接嘅。
examples.jyutping: ni1 tou3 din6 jing2 hai6 jau4 dou6 jin2 can1 zi6 zin2 zip3 ge3.
examples.translation: The film was edited by the director himself.

senses.definition: 將長袖#衫，尤其是#恤衫 嘅袖捲起 (to roll up the sleeves)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 天時暑熱，好多人都會褶袖。
examples.translation: Many people have their sleeves rolled up, as the weather is hot.

senses.definition: 一種手工用紙，好薄而且皺嘅。 (crepe paper)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 證據，事件發生過後留低嘅痕跡同線索 (traces, clues, evidence left behind; literally: threads of a spider and trail of a horse)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 警方喺兇案現場尋找蛛絲馬跡，希望及早破案。
examples.translation: The police is finding clues of the murder at the scene, hoping to solve the case soon.

senses.definition: 按鐘出糧嘅兼職傭工（量詞：個） (part-time maid who is paid on an hourly basis)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zung1 dim2 cing1 git3 gung1 jan4
examples.translation: part-time cleaning worker

senses.definition: 即係#做場戲 (to create drama; to deceive, to set a trap, to put on a show or an act to deceive someone)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 都係做場大戲俾人睇啫，何必咁認真呢
examples.translation: It's just a drama to show everybody, why so serious?

senses.definition: 冇聲音 (silent; quiet)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: absolute silence

senses.definition: #孤單、被冷落 (solitary)

examples.translation: lonely

senses.definition: 將繩、線或者毛冷縱橫交錯，從而令線變成一個平面或者立體嘅動作 (to weave; to knit)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zik1 bou3
examples.translation: to weave

senses.definition: 好緊張錢銀方面嘅嘢，好小心去計數 (careful calculation and strict budgeting)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 家庭主婦要識得精打細算。
examples.jyutping: gaa1 ting4 zyu2 fu5 jiu3 sik1 dak1 zing1 daa2 sai3 syun3.
examples.translation: A housewife should be able to calculate carefully and budget strictly.

senses.definition: 準備；安排；籌備 (to prepare; to plan; to organise)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 坐低嗰陣可以挨住或者坐係上面嘅軟墊或者#咕𠱸 (seat cushion; pillow or soft pad put on a chair)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: to lean backwards on a seat cushion

senses.definition: 形容人以為自己好重要或者好勁，但實際上並唔係 (self-important; arrogant)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zi6 daai5 kwong4
examples.translation: egomania

senses.definition: 了解自己，又能夠了解對手嘅實力，從而可以喺打仗或者交手嘅時候立於不敗之地 (to know oneself and the opponent well; to know the enemy and know yourself)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 簡潔；精致；小巧；用嚟形容包裝同設計 ((of packages and designs) compact; exquisite)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: zing1 zong1 mou4 jing4 gu2 dung2 ce1
examples.translation: exquisite model of antique car

senses.definition: 一班人聚埋一齊食嘅飯局（量詞：次） (dining party)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sing3 daan3 zit3 zeoi6 caan1
examples.translation: Christmas dining party

senses.definition: （通常比較諷刺）對一個人嘅外貌嘅稱呼（量詞：副） ((usually used ironically) your appearance)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tai2 nei5 go2 fu3 zyun1 jung4!
examples.translation: See what a face you've got!

senses.definition: 只講唔做；得個講字 (to say or promise something without realizing it)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你齋噏有鬼用咩，要做先得𠿪。
examples.jyutping: nei5 zaai1 ngap1 jau5 gwai2 jung6 me1, jiu3 zou6 sin1 dak1 gaa2.
examples.translation: Your words means nothing until you put it into action.

senses.definition: 突然；冇預警之下 (suddenly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: zaau6 jin4 lei4 sai3
examples.translation: to pass away suddenly

senses.definition: 斷絕關係，唔再有來往 (to break off relations usu. between friends or countries)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢對你咁差，一於同佢絕交唧！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 deoi3 nei5 gam3 caa1, jat1 jyu1 tung4 keoi5 zyut6 gaau1 zek1!
examples.translation: He treats you so bad, why don't you break off with him?

senses.definition: 或者#正路 ；（法律上同道德上） 正確嘅路 ((legally and morally) right way)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: cung4 zing3 tou4 wok6 dak1 ge3 zi1 seon3
examples.translation: information obtained legally and morally

senses.definition: 指物件被放喺水入面，直至物件由內至外都充滿水份 (to drench; to impregnate)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 照顧；幫助 (to look after; to help)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你應該識多幾個朋友，等有咩事可以互相照應吖嘛！
examples.jyutping: nei5 jing1 goi1 sik1 do1 gei2 go3 pang4 jau5, dang2 jau5 me1 si6 ho2 ji5 wu6 soeng1 ziu3 jing3 aa1 maa3!
examples.translation: You should make more friends, so you can take care of each other if there is any problem.

senses.definition: 模仿人類爬行嘅姿勢而設計嘅游水方式 ((of swimming) freestyle; crawl)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 自由泳係四式當中最舒服嘅泳式。
examples.jyutping: zi6 jau4 wing6 hai6 sei3 sik1 dong1 zung1 zeoi3 syu1 fuk6 ge3 wing6 sik1.
examples.translation: Freestyle is the most comfortable among the four swimming styles.

senses.definition: 因為一啲事而令到另一件事被提及、開始做 (to trigger; to touch off)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zuk1 faat3 zin3 zang1
examples.translation: to trigger a war

senses.definition: 為長輩或者老年人嘅生日送上祝福 (to congratulate the elderly or seniors on their birthday)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今日婆婆八十大壽，我要去佢屋企同佢祝壽。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 po4 po2 baat3 sap6 daai6 sau6, ngo5 jiu3 heoi3 keoi5 uk1 kei2 tung4 keoi5 zuk1 sau6.
examples.translation: Today is the 80th birthday of my grandmother. I need to visit and celebrate with her.

senses.definition: 研究討論嗰陣特定嘅主題 (special topic; specific topic)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zyun1 tai4 tou2 leon6
examples.translation: discussion on a special topic

senses.definition: 專登扮嘢；唔係出於自然嘅表現；做作 (to behave in an affected way; to pretend)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你咁裝模作樣真係令人好反感。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam3 zong1 mou4 zok3 joeng6 zan1 hai6 ling6 jan4 hou2 faan2 gam2.
examples.translation: I am sick of your affected manner.

senses.definition: 生果名，一種細隻嘅 #芒果 (small mango)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 爭取比人優秀並且獲勝 (to compete for victory; to try to win)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: the determination to win

senses.definition: 見#豬頭 (literally, pig's head trumpet mouth; used figuratively to describe a badly beaten and swollen face)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #用餐、#食飯 (to dine, eat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gung6 zeon3 maan5 caan1
examples.translation: to dine together

senses.definition: 珍珠寶石光亮耀眼，形容服飾華麗 (to be brilliantly decorated or ornamented)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 san1 zyu1 gwong1 bou2 hei3
examples.translation: wholly decorated in luxurious style

senses.definition: 增加外表美觀嘅物品 (量詞：個) (adornment)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #早餐 (通常喺非香港地區用) (breakfast (not commonly used in Hong Kong))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 性情直接，唔虛偽 (staightforward, outspoken; not hypocritical)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 wai4 jan4 zik6 leot6.
examples.translation: He is a very straightforward man.

senses.definition: #似樣；一樣嘢睇落唔錯，無一啲明顯嘅問題 (presentable; decent)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 同廠商簽約，負責處理佢嘅產品喺特定地區所有行銷事宜嘅代理商 (general agency)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 負責審訊嘅 (person in charge of a trial)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: zyu2 sam2 faat3 gun1
examples.translation: adjudicating judge

senses.definition: 驚到連個身都震埋 (shivery; someone trembles due to the fear)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 自己屋企嘅，強調唔係其他地方嘅 (my / our own)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: zi6 gaa1 zai3
examples.translation: homemade

senses.definition: 即係#呢度 (here; see #呢度 Ni1Dou6)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 zoeng1 cin2 fong3 hai2 ni1 dou6.
examples.translation: I put the money here.

senses.definition: #呢排，呢段時間 (recently; these days)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 即係 #噉樣 (see #噉樣 gam2 joeng2)
senses.label: 代詞

senses.definition: 即係#咁 (such; like this)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 jing1 goi1 sai2 gam3 do1 cin2.
examples.translation: I should not spend so much money.

senses.definition: 即係#噉 (in this way; so)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam2 nam2 do:u1 hai6 zing3 soeng4 ge2.
examples.translation: It is normal for him to think in this way.

senses.definition: （指地方或者空間）因為人多，所以#逼 ((of a place or space) crowded)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 演唱會場地太擠擁好容易發生意外。
examples.jyutping: jin2 coeng3 wui2 coeng4 dei6 taai3 zai1 jung2 hou2 jung4 ji6 faat3 sang1 ji3 ngoi6.
examples.translation: If the concert venue is too crowded, accidents will happen easily.

senses.definition: 停低腳步 (to halt; to stop walking)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個街頭藝人唱歌好好聽，令到啲途人駐足聆聽。
examples.jyutping: go3 gaai1 tau4 ngai6 jan4 coeng3 go1 hou2 hou2 teng1, ling6 dou3 di1 tou4 jan4 zyu3 zuk1 ling4 ting3.
examples.translation: The busker sings so well that the passers by are halted and listen to her.

senses.definition: 畀金錢或者物質上嘅援助 (to give material assistance to; to give financial aid to)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: dak1 dou2 ngoi6 gaa1 zip3 zai3
examples.translation: to get financial support from one's maiden home

senses.definition: 一般、正常 (normally; generally)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢正路應該唔會直接返屋企。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zing3 lou6 jing1 goi1 m4 wui5 zik6 zip3 faan1 uk1 kei2.
examples.translation: He normally will not go home directly.

senses.definition: 將一樣嘢由其他人手上拎過嚟，由自己去管理 (to take over something and be in charge of such)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你都大個仔啦！係時候接掌爸爸間公司。
examples.jyutping: nei5 dou1 daai6 go3 zai2 laa1! hai6 si4 hau6 zip3 zoeng2 baa4 baa1 gaan1 gung1 si1.
examples.translation: You are big enough to take over my company and be in charge of it, my son!

senses.definition: 一樣嘢嘅價值隨著時間或耗損而下降嘢過程 (depreciation)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 曲折；經好多人接觸或者處理過 (indirectly; passing from one person to another)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 呢件#古董 輾轉又返到嚟我手上。
examples.jyutping: nei1 gin6 gu2 dung2 zin2 zyun2 jau6 faan1 dou3 lai4 ngo5 sau2 soeng6.
examples.translation: This antique has passed through many hands and it comes back to me.

senses.definition: (正式)表達敬意、感激之意 ((formal)to send one's regards; to express one's gratitude; to pay tribute to)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我代表公司向各位來賓致意。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 doi6 biu2 gung1 si1 hoeng3 gok3 wai2 loi4 ban1 zi3 ji3.
examples.translation: On behalf of the company, I'd like to pay tribute to all the guests.

senses.definition: (正式) #再見 ((formal) goodbye; farewell)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 各位觀眾，節目到此結束，再會！
examples.translation: (To the audience,) Everybody, this is the end of the show, goodbye!

senses.definition: #露營 常用嘅用具。用支架撐起帆布，提供遮蔽嘅地方。（量詞：個） (tent)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daap3 zoeng3 mok6 lou6 jing4
examples.translation: to set up a tent for camping

senses.definition: 用嚟笠住#枕頭 嘅布袋，等個枕頭冇咁易整污糟（量詞：個） (pillowcase)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今個星期換咗枕頭袋未啊？
examples.translation: Have you changed the pillowcase this week?

senses.definition: 通常指唔容易達成嘅目標或者方向 (ideal; ambition)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 做人志向要遠大，唔好淨係顧住目前。
examples.jyutping: zou6 jan4 zi3 hoeng3 jiu3 jyun5 daai6, m4 hou2 zing6 hai6 gu3 zyu6 muk6 cin4.
examples.translation: One should have a broad and long-range ambition and should not only care about today.

senses.definition: #注入#資金；大額投資某公司 (to bankroll; to supply the capital for)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 生活上嘅#困苦 (suffering; hardship)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: man4 gaan1 zat6 fu2
examples.translation: folk hardship

senses.definition: 通過外力，例如手術，去改變自己原本嘅外貌 (to have plastic surgery)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zing2 jing4 sau2 seot6

senses.definition: 用法同「#之」。日文本身讀 no [nɔ̜ ̝]，係「…之…、…嘅…」噉解。但受到香港品牌「優の良品」讀做「優之良品」影響，中文夾雜「の」字嘅話，多數會讀成「之」，或者直接用返「之」字代替，例如商場「新の城」會讀做「新之城」甚至打成「新之城」。喺現今香港，有唔少舖頭、品牌為求睇落去有日本嘅風味，都會用個「の」字去代替「的／之／嘅」字 (used the same way as #之; loan from Japanese; it is pronounced "no" [nɔ̜ ̝] in Japanese, but in Hong Kong it is often simply pronounced "之 (zi1)", and the character "之" can be substituted in place of "の"; for example "新の城" is pronounced "新之城" and can be written as "新之城"; in Hong Kong, many brand names use "の" in place of "之" in attempt to pass off as authentic Japanese)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: jau1 zi1 loeng4 ban2
examples.translation: Aji Ichiban, a snack franchise in Hong Kong

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA

泛指各種租金管制及保障租客居住權嘅規例。香港由1920年代起推行過唔同形式嘅租務管制，直至1998年租金管制被撤銷(每兩年不得加租超過三成)，至2004年居住權保障亦完全取消(一年收回單位通知期及原租客續租權等)。 (Tenancy Control, including rent control and right of housing protection regulation. Hong Kong had a series of tenancy control policies in different period of time since 1920s, until 1998 the rent control was canceled (prohibited to raise the rent over 30% in every 2 years), and in 2004 all the protection of housing rights are removed (1 year of notice before reclaim of flat and right of continuing lease for the original tenant))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 近年樓價同租金都大幅上升，好多基層團體都請願要求政府重設租務管制。
examples.translation: In recent years the property price and rent has raised so much, many grass-root organizations have held petitions to request for re-enforcing tenancy control.
